25a4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga gsum gyi bskyed par bya// de ye shes sems dpa' gzhug/ mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni// 'dod pa'i don yang gsol ba btab// de nas lan grangs brgya stong snyed// bsnyen pa rdzogs byas// 
25a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas skor bya// de nyid de la thim gyur te// de yi yid du mi 'ongs pa// pa spu'i khung sogs las 'thon par// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khrus byas te// rma byas byab cing bkra shis gdon// nad pa la ni logs 
25a6(rgyud 'grel): su ste// gos bcas bkrus nas dor bar bya// lhag ma la ni lhar bskyed de// mchod dang bstod dang 'dod pa'i don// gsol ba btab la bzod par gsol// de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya// 'jig rten 
25a7(rgyud 'grel): skyong sogs de bzhin no// de nas dkyil 'khor legs par bsdu// dben par dor la bskor ba bya// 'dis ni bkra shis thams cad sbyin// yid du mi 'ong sel bar byed// gang yang mi 'byung med pa'i phyir// rnal 'byer pa yis/ 
25a8(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bya// na mo ra&t+ya yA ya/ na maHAr+tha ba la ki ti shra d+ha ya/ bo d+hi sa d+hA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya// ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya// oM tA re trat+tA re tra re/ sarba rba te/ sarba bya d+hi/ sarba tsar/ sarba biH/ sarba duR+shan+ta 
25b1(rgyud 'grel): thab/ sarba pA pa rbags na ye An+tu// 'phags ma nal mnag canam rnas bya ba'i las kyi yan lag thas bya cha nal lam ba ban pardzogs so// / rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma drug 'tshal la// 'am 
25b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba mongs pas te// de bas la bu N+DI shes rab bskyed// thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin su// gcig tu phan mdzad dngos thub ser// ngag gi dbang drug zhi za ma// bdag bsam g.yas g.yon mdun rgya bdu// yid 
25b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhung dran pa shes rab dang // bla yi rang bzhin lha mo bzhi// snga ma lta bur bsgom par bya// srid pa'i 'khor lo zla ba'i dbus// rnam snang las byung dag rang bzhin// rgyun mi 'chad 'byung de dbus gnas/ 
25b4(rgyud 'grel): mi smra'i sbyor bas gsang sngags bzlas// 'o ma gser mdog tsha ba gsum// pa da shu dang rgyam tshwa la// lan bdun bzlas pas bcom ldan 'grub// 'o ma bre bzhi srang gcig sman// mar bre gang sbyar me la ga tu// 
25b5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gcig gis lan med cing // drug gis mngon sum 'thon par 'gyur// shu dag shing mngar sen+d+ha ba// gser mdog dong bkral la bud// zi ra ru rta pi pi ling // lan bdun bzlas nas zos gyur na// zla ba drug dang / 
25b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang gcig/ go rims bzhin du thos 'dzin dang // sa bdag nyid dang blo ldan zhing // tshangs pa'i nga ro thob par 'gyur// gangs las skyes pa'i gser mdog dang // shu dag tho rangs lan bdun bzlas// 
25b7(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gcig brten de nyid du// tshig bdag yid gzhungs dbyangs snyan cing // shes rab ldan do zla drug gis// ngag gis dbang phyug rang bzhin thob// oM tA re dut+tA re tu re hI ma hA ma yaM ge ma hA swa ras kyi nAM ma ma 
25b8(rgyud 'grel): pra kri t+ya pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harma pra ba~M ta pa ri shud d+ho nyaM sa pa s+ya a pa yan ta ra sAhA// 'phags ma sgrol ma chags pa thams cad 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag blo 'phel bar byed pa'i cho ga'i le'u/ 
26a1(rgyud 'grel): sde bco lnga pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun pa 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// nal 'thor bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir// dben pa'i phyogs su chag chag dang // maN+Dal gnyis dang mchod sogs 
26a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis// bsham bya rje btsun rten yang gzhag/ bstan ba de la gnas sems can la// snying rje che ba khyed 'di rnams ni// rje btsun gnas dgod dam bcas nas// de yi gtor ma btang bar bya// de nas snying ka'i/ 
26a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis// thun mong khyad par spyan drangs te// mchod pa cha res mchod par bya// de nas bdag gi spyi bor a// de las zla ba de steng tam// gsum po yongs su gyur pa las// rje btsun zhal 
26a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis ma// mi 'jigs uta pa la g.yas dang g.yon// sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// mgul chings gdub bu do sha la can// sku gsung thugs mtshan ye shes sems// skye mched
26a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag dbu rgyan mdzes// phyag gi bdud rtsis bdag rgyas par// bsam zhing gsang sngags gdon par bya// phyi yi phyag rgya rdzas kyi bsdu// nang gi nang du bsdu bya'i tshe// bsgrub bya bsdus shing tshim par 
26a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de nas gtor ma cig shos btang // 'gro ba'i phyogs bcom bcom ldan ma// zhal bzangs dag la gzigs par bsam// de nas bstod dang bzlas pa bya// des ni 'jigs pa kun skyob 'gyur// 
26a7(rgyud 'grel): oM na ma AR+ShA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya// bo d+hi sa thA ya/ ma hA sa trA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya tha/ au tA re tuT+TA re tu re sarba duSh+Ta na ma ma kri te// dzaM b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ mo hA ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ 
26a8(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+TAn staM b+ha ni tA ra~M swAhA// 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag chom rkun bcings pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu drug pa 
26b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo// bag med la sogs mi rnams la// gdug pa'i yid ldan dud 'gro'i rigs/ yid bltas pa dang mche ba dang // reg pa'i sgo nas 'tshe bar byed// 
26b2(rgyud 'grel): grogs po phug dog mo yi sgor// wa khang 'dam rdzab mi sdug gzugs// ri gzar 'dzeg dang dud 'gros 'tshe// mtsho 'gram 'dug sogs gnod pa'i rtags// gru la dga' dang nub mon// yan 
26b3(rgyud 'grel): lag mi bde lus lci zhing // shu ba g.yan ba pas ljags dang // 'brum bu la sogs thebs la 'byung // mi dga' ba dang za 'phrug dang // sha mdog nyams dang me ras dang // res 'ga' chu grang thugs bzhin dang // bas 
26b4(rgyud 'grel): ljags sha bkra 'byung ba yin// sha 'phrig sbrid dang bems por 'dug/ mig na chi zhing zlum pa dang // srin ma la sogs kyi 'gyur te// lag sor skam par gyur pa'o// lus la dring 'byung 'gyur zhing // chu bur dang ni nya spangs 
26b5(rgyud 'grel): can// rnag dang chu ser rul dri mnam// ro bstod dag kyang zug par 'gyur// phyi yi sha skam mdog 'chor zhing // sha ye mdangs med zug dang bcas// gos kyang mdangs dang bral 'gyur te// glog pa char yag ma 
26b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// de dag bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// lha yi sbyor bar gnas pa yi// gu gul gla rtsi shu dag dang // ru rta btsan dug shing kun dang // da lis rnams la gsang sngags che// 'bum phrag gsum bsnyen byas pa 
26b7(rgyud 'grel): yis// de bsrung gla rtsi mi skyod sbyar// gnas lngar byug cing bkru bar bya// 'di ni sbyor ba zab mo ste// mi la ri dgas ji bzhin du// gang la bsrung ba 'dis brgyan pa// de la ldang ldan 'bros par 'gyur// gnyis pa la
26b8(rgyud 'grel): ni shu dag dang // gla ci ru rta gu gul dang // mu zi ro ras rgya tshil dang // shi ba'i dri chen phag pa'i bcud// sgog skya dang ni ma du dang // mi yi bcud dang rus pa'i phye// mi bcud kyis bsdus ri lu ste// snga ma gnyis 
27a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bsnyen pa yis// dbang po'i sgo rnams bdug bya ste// nyi ma'i 'od la mun pa bzhin// dug can rnams ni nam du'ang // 'ong bar nus pa ma yin no// gsum pa la ni gsum 'gyur te/ 
27a2(rgyud 'grel): gong ma'i rdzas kyi sbyor ba dang // glu yi dug dang bdud rtsi bsten// 'bar ba'i me yis nags tshal bzhin// des gzhan nad rnams 'tshig par 'gyur// bzhi pa la ni bya ba ste// gong ma'i rdzas kyis sbyor ba dang // 
27a3(rgyud 'grel): klu yi dug dang rnam rgyal bsten// rtsa mig dag kyang bsal bar bya// nyi mas gang zhing de 'joms so// lnga pa la yang de bzhin te// khyad par du ni a ru ra// dri chu gla rtsi bsten par bya// rdo rje yis ni rin chen 
27a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// thogs pa med par 'jig par 'gyur// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re ku lu kul+le/ sarba sha truM bak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/ hUM hUM nA ga staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ yaM raM khaM suM ne ra la ne hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 
27a5(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag kru nad gso ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// mi yi dbang
27a6(rgyud 'grel): po la sogs pas// shin tu dam par bsdams pa rnams// rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir// ba glang lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bya// dbus su phyag mtshan sa bon bcas// de la de nyid spyan drangs la// mchod pa
27a7(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro ba yis// dang po bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya// de rnams sbyor gzhan rab spangs te// bcom ldan mchod nas brgya phrag brgya// gsol ba'i mchod pa dang bcas pas// legs par bzlas na
27a8(rgyud 'grel): grol bar 'gyur// na mo ra ta na tha yA ya// na maHAR+ShA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa thA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ maN+Da kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ri dzu ka d+ha nI/ naR+shi ya te/ tA re tA rA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti tut+tA re/ b+ha ma b+ha ma/ 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): mo tsa ne shwa re swAhA// 'phags ma sgrol ma sdug bsngal thams cad bsreg pa'i las kyi yan lag khri mon las thar bar byed pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la 
27b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi gang la rab bsngags pa// dngos grub de nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir// mig dang lce dang mkhris pa rnams// rin chen ga'u'i nang du gzhug/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung byas nas/ 
27b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par byed pa'i bsnyen pa btsal// chog par shes nas pad car sbar// dag pa'i mig las dben par 'gyur// na mo rata na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru 
27b4(rgyud 'grel): k+Sha ya/ taHthA/ oMt+ta raShA ra ShA ra dza ma/ nga ye ye/ !Sh+Thar dza ya b+hA ye tra ra swAH// 'dugs ma sgrol ma dngas grub thams cad ster bar byed ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag ma snang ba'i tshe 
27b5(rgyud 'grel): le'u ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// ma bong ba'i chos la 'og min du// 'phags rnams spyod yul dang gcig cing // yid kyi shugs kyis bskyod byed pa/ 
27b6(rgyud 'grel): zangs dang lcags dang gser dag las// 'bar ba'i ral gri byas nas su// yu ba gzhung dang go rims bzhin// gnyis dang bcu gcig sor du ldan// A li kA li g.yas g.yon te// yi ge bcu pa dbus 
27b7(rgyud 'grel): su'o// gnas skabs gsum du sku sogs gsum// sgra dang me stag 'od 'phro ba// rab 'bring rtags dang ldan pa las// chags med yid kyis bskyod byas te// 'dab gshog rgyas pa'i bya bzhin tu// gang 
27b8(rgyud 'grel): dang gang du bsam pa yis// zhing khams dag tu 'dod pa'i don// thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur// o tA re tut+tA re tu re a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/ khang ge pra sid+d+hi/ lo ka A lo ka/ tiSh+Tha rat+na tsa la tsa la 
28a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM baM baM a tis+tha swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag mchog bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun ma 'phags ma 
28a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// gser brtsegs rab mdzes snod dag tu/ 'o ma mar dang sran chan dang // la pug mngar dang me tog spos// dag pa'i chu dang chang la sogs// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge yis// 
28a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs nas 'byung po rnams la sbyin// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nur+thAnA twAta/ oM AHhUM phaT swA hA// gtor ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun ma 'phags ma 
28a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// mtsho 'am khron pa 'bab chu gtsang // bcom ldan mche ge sbyin bdud rtsi yis// gdung bral 'phags pa'i rang bzhin du// bsgyur nas gsang sngags rgyal po ni// bdun phrag gsum 
28a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis yi dgas rnams// rab tu tshim pa'i cho ga bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba pre te b+haHswA hA// chu sbyin pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 
28a6(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim dkar ba'i sa rnams la// rigs lngar sbyangs nas de'i rang bzhin// de las mtshad rten gdab byas la// de dag gnas su dam tshig ste// de la ye shes de dbang bskur// de la sbyin brlab de nas mchod// 
28a7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas byas de nas ni// dge ba'i gnas su gzhug par bya// oM tA re dut+tA re tu re sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA// tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga'i lo'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun 
28a8(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// gso sbyong dag la gnas pa yi// ka ti ka yi thal ba la// stong phrag bcu yi bsnyen pa bya// chu shel spyod yul yar ngo la// dri dbang byed g.yas seng ge'i tshul/ 
28b1(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig 'dod pa'i don bsnag ste// 'dod pa'i lha dang dus gsum gyi// skye ba'i gnas rnams ston par mdzad// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re tad+ya thA/ oM mug+hi ri pra ma dan+te kha rgo ya sha/ sho ma d+ha ra tsa ra bye/ me hA ni sA/ 
28b2(rgyud 'grel): dan+ti li swAhA/ dus gsum btag pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sbrum ma dang ni mgo mjug log/ mo skam bu ni skyed byed dang / 
28b3(rgyud 'grel): srin bu bsrung dang 'byung po zlog/ las gang byed pa'i lhar gyur bya// dang po go ro tsa na dang // yung ba ba bla'i ri lu la// snag tshas byas la sngags bris la// bdud rtsi lnga dang 'bru sna lnga/ rin chen lnga dang 'bru sna lnga/ 
28b4(rgyud 'grel): bum par bcug la gsang sngags 'di// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas byin brlab// sngags chus nam phyed yol ba'i dus// mchod pa byas la sbrum ma des// khrus byas bde bar btsa' zhing 'byung // gnyis pa mar dag lag 
28b5(rgyud 'grel): mthil du// gzhag la gsang sngags nyi shu gcig/ bzlas la mgo lus b+ha ga b+hA ga/ de ltar byas na bde bar skye// gsum pa po de tsi yi 'brum// bye ma dag dang ba dmar ser// 'o ma bsres la bum 
28b6(rgyud 'grel): par blugs// gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// zla mtshan byung dus tha ma'i tshe// blud na bu dag myur du skye// bzhi pa 'phral skyes byis pa de// khrus byas bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur// lnga pa gsang sngags 
28b7(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyis// yungs kar nyi shu gcig bsngags nas// gdong bu brabs na 'byung ba ldog/ oM tA re ni ta rA ya/ oM mo tsa ni mo tsA ya// oM mo k+Sha ni mo k+Sha ya dzi ba ba ra d+hi swA hA// bskyed cing bsring ba la
28b8(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// // bde gshegs bskyed mdzad rje btsun gyi// rnal 'byor byang chub yan lag bzang // thabs kyi khyad par mdor bsdus pa// zhi ba la sogs 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): las bzhi'i tshul// bdag gzhan don kun sgrub byed pa// thugs rje chu skyes las byung ba'i// sbrang rtsi 'di ni bdag gis bzhi pas// 'gro la phan phyir 'dir bkod do// de las byung ba'i 
29a2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba yis// 'gro ba ma lus byang chub che// sku gsum rang bzhin mthar phyin pa// myur ba nyid du thob par shog/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i las kyi yan lag 
29a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba// kha che'i slob dpon nyi ma sbas pa zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba mal gyi blo gros grags pas
29a4(rgyud 'grel): bri ka ma shI la'i gtsug lag khang chen po de nyid du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @#// sgros pa'i rgyamams can gzhi sa pa lags/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ tA ra sA d+ha nAM u pa de sha kra ma 
29a5(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs man ngag gi rim pa/ rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// phun sum tshogs ldan dpal 'byor dri med yon tan gyi// zh-ing shAr 'grol dang 
29a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam ster rgyal ba'i yum// sgrol ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos blangs te 'gro ba la// phan phyir brtse bas bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// rdo rje slob dpon yon tan mchi// ji bzhin sbyong bas 
29a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen byas nas// cho ga'i rim pas dbang bsrur ba'i// rnal 'byor pas ni rnam par bsgom// ji ltar bshad bzhin rnam bsams la// sa bon gyis ni bskul ba yi// tha ma rjems mchod la 
29a8(rgyud 'grel): bus pa'i bsam pas rtse gcig tu// bcud la byinas rang lus gzug/ slar yang dkyil 'khor rdzogs paraH// pu dza mo a gar de ma/ oM thai ko ka la ka he/ bre bris su na sims// 
29b1(rgyud 'grel): skye bo'i gnas su pul+li rar// myur shing dpa' mo dran par bya// spyi gtsug 'bar ba 'dzin pa ru// ston zla lta bur dri ma med// gser gyi mdog can rna ba ni/ g.yas pa o rgyan nyid du bsam// ar 
29b2(rgyud 'grel): pr-i ta ni lhag pa ste// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal bar grags// gaud pa ri rna ba g.yon// hUMs sgrogs pa'i lha mo'o// sprin dbus ra me shwa ri ste// rdo rje sku yi sgrol ma'o// 'khor lo dang ni cher sgrogs pa/ 
29b3(rgyud 'grel): dril bu g.yas dang gzhan du bsam// dbang mchog de bo ko Ti ste// khams gsum rnam par rgyal byed do// gzhan 'joms lha mo dpung pa'i ngos// ma lar sgrub po dam pas bsam/ 
29b4(rgyud 'grel): mchan khung kA ma ru pa ste// bdud 'joms dam pa sbyin pa mo// o Ta zhes bya nu ma ste// 'khor lo bsgyur byed 'dod ster ma// tri sha ku ni lte ba ru// mya ngan kun 'joms bsam par bya// dri 
29b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gnas su ko sa lar// 'gro ba kun 'gugs phongs pa sel// ka ling ka ni kha yin te// lha mo bkra shis thams cad ster// mgrin pa'i gnas ni lam pa kar// lha mo gsung 
29b6(rgyud 'grel): gi sgrol ma ste// pad ma dril bu 'dzin pa ru// mnyam par gzhag la rtag tu bsam// kany+tsi snying gi grong khyer te// rdo rje thugs kyi sgrol ma'o// mig sman gyi ni kha dog can// rdo rje dal bus 
29b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gying pa yin// kha ba'i ring ni smin byed ma// sum mdo'i gnas su bsam par bya// yi dgas grong du 'gugs byed ma// khra mo rtags kyi rtse mo la// zhi ba chen mo khyim gyi lhar// 'og gi phyogs 
29b8(rgyud 'grel): su bsgom par bya// brla gnyis so so raSh+Ta yin te// 'dod chags thams cad 'joms pa mo// gser gling byin pa zung gi tshal// lha mo bde ba bsgrub byed do// sor mo phal pa na ga rar/ 
30a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par thal ma bsam pad+maH// drug pasngal phrag byad sin+na ste// rkang pa'i bol du rnam par dgad// rgan po ma dngas thub bran// lags 'byung rnam bsam paraH/ 
30a2(rgyud 'grel): ku lu tar ni yongs rdzogs ma// pus mo'i dkyil 'khor gnyis la gnas// da ltar cho ga rdzogs pa dang // phyis ni rdo rje sgrol ma yi// dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i lha rnams kun// rang gi lus la 
30a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya// dri ma thams cad sbyang ba'i phyir// spyan drang mchod nas gsol ba gdab// de bzhin thub pas dbang bskur la// dbu rgyan rang gi lhag pa'i lha// gsang sngags bzlas brjod cho
30a4(rgyud 'grel): ga dang // mtshan ma kha dog la sogs pa// gzhan du bshad bzhin mkhas pa yis// mnyam par gzhag pas rtag tu bya// zab mo'i don la skye bo yis// blo gros rnam par 'khrul gyur 
30a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang // dam pa'i bla ma las byung ba'i// man ngag rim pa bris pa yin// bsod nams 'di yis nye pa'i rba grong g.yo ba'i chu// rnam par dkrugs te 'khrigs pa'i nor 'dzin brtan pa

30a7(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po nyi ma sbas pas zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // man ngag gi rim pa'i sgrub thabs 'di dang po ma 'gyur ba las phyis kha che'i paN+Di tas kha ba can gyi ljongs su spyan drangs pa'i dpe las bod skad

30b1(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum rgyal ba skye mdzad yum// shes rab pha rol phyin bdag

30b3(rgyud 'grel): mkhar bzhugs mchod// sdig bsal bsod nams yongs rdzogs bya// rnam dag sngags kyi dri bsal la// sku gsung thugs dngos bskyed dang rdzogs// cho ga ji bzhin ji snyed par// ma 'khrugs 
30b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa med par bsgom// 'phags ma sgrol ma che nyid sku// yongs gyur 'dod sbyin sna tshogs gzugs// sna tshogs nor bu'i tshul bzhin du// gdul bya'i dbang can yongs gyur blta// ye shes 
30b5(rgyud 'grel): gzug cing byin brlabs la// dbang bskur mchod cing rgyas gdab bya// 'od zer 'byor pas 'gro skyob dang // dngos grub blangs te bzlas pa bya// phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo// spyan ni skad cig/ 
30b6(rgyud 'grel): glog dang 'jam// 'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi// ge sar dbye ba las ni byang ma// spyan ras gzigs mgon thugs rje ma// chu skyes zhal gyi gaM sar las// chu 'dzin las skyes 
30b7(rgyud 'grel): klog 'byung bzhin// byung bas rab dga'i grol ma bsgom// mkha' dkyil gser mdog chu skyes gdan// zhal gcig phyag brgyad chos sgrogs dang // mda' gzhu 'khor lo ral gri dang // rdo rje zhags bcas// 
30b8(rgyud 'grel): me rtag brgyan// de ya~M zin las gzhan gyi mtha// phyir bzlog bstan byar lham bsnyen// bslab bya'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bya// de dbus te khung drag gzugs dgang // seng gar rtsibs brgyad spel tshig 
31a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags// man ngag bzhin bkod the gus drang // sbu gu snying btad lha sbyor gyis/ spod byed rten bral yang yar gzhug/ lha mo khros pas mchod rten ni// nag po khri 'bang bzhi ldan brtsig/ 
31a2(rgyud 'grel): rgod gsung rna ba mgul dang thos// snom pa'i bdud byed shes par bya// rgyun mi 'chad pa'i lha sbyor gyis// dgug gzhug bsnyems nas mnan bya ste// mtshan ma rnyed nas sngar gzugs sreg/ rang gnas 
31a3(rgyud 'grel): slar yang tsi ta sa mnan// rus ldan stong gis gcig bsngags kyang // mtshon cha'i sbyor ba slar nyes bzhin// bdag nyid bdag gis phung bar byed// mchod bstod snying rjes mi btang zhes// oM tA ra 
31a4(rgyud 'grel): shU/ re rims pa/ 8/ \u0f7f// oMd+had sh+tsan+d+ha rA N+Dar rjeg mo sa~MSh+Taba~MHbaT+TaT+TaH/ na tan/ dAd+hAdaH/ bad+hAm+b+ha pa bstan pa// A mu ka mA ra ya Ta/ mA ra ya shwa ra d+hA dz+nyA baT pa T+Ta swAT+Ta/ 
31a5(rgyud 'grel): tA re tut+tA re tu re ma hA pany+tsa yak+Sha stam b+ha ya hri baM hri la ma raM/ paT ku ru ku la b+h+yo// rje btsun ma sgrol ma mUr ma dpa' mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // phyag 'tshal ston ka'i zla ba

31b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs maN+Dal maN+Dal dgod// dbus su yum bcas 'od dpag med// phyogs mtshams rigs bzhi yum bzhi dgod// khor yug phyogs skyong bcas dkyil 'khor// ma lus rgyan gyis mdzes par bya//

31b8(rgyud 'grel): re// A yug+h+nAn d+ha ra d+ha ra bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra ya ma pra hi da ya di hi swA hA// rang lo'i grangs kyi brgya rtsa brgyad// sangs rgyas kun dngos tshe yi dpal// grangs te nyi shu gcig bstod bya// zhag re zla re las 
32a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phel// rje btsun ma sgrol ma pha rol phyin ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // phyag mtshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsug tor// mtha' yas rnam par rgyal ba spyod ma/

32b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dus drug seng ldeng bsreg/ sgo gnyis zangs ma'i thur mas bru// sa bon 'od dmar shugs drag gi/ lcags kyus bkug ste zhags pas bcings// skra g.yengs gcer bu rkang 'dud bsam/ 
32b3(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod rdzas gsum rdo rje'i chus// sbyar te sngags bcas sbyin par bya// de rdzas skes tshe ming dang bcas// dbang sdud yid kyis sbyin sreg bya// bdun phrag zhag ni gcig dang gnyis// de bzhin bdun 
32b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi mi mo dang // mi pho lha mo sogs dbang bskur// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re lam+b+ha/ lam+b+ha so sA tik+Sha si u kro si baM sha ka ra ya a mu kaM s+ya d+harma g+ha Da ni ra ha tra tsa ma na kha b+h+yaHsed ha da ha s+thi d+h+ya ma ma sA 
32b5(rgyud 'grel): kar+tha ha lam pa ni bi ruSh+Ti pa la rdza pa tsa tI rata no te ba la ne da tsam ne he kra to nid kr-i s+'u dz+ra rA Ni ya tri bya sa ne haM ba lan nab tu phu ra sa b+hi taM// a N+Da ma tha ma mthalo la swAd+ha/ A muk+Sha swA d+han pa ra ba tAMr+tha 
32b6(rgyud 'grel): das ma na ye swA hA/ oM ku ru kul+le hriHswA hA// 'bum phrag rnal 'byor rtse gcig gis// me tog bdug pa bza' btung dag/ byin na brgya byin yang dbang byed// me tog dmar po'i sbyin sreg gces// 
32b7(rgyud 'grel): yungs kar skyes bu mchog la bsngags// khar ba'i sdong du sbrad rtsi mar// sngags dang bcas gus dus gsum du// mchod pa bcas pas don rnams 'grub// kham por ram ni dung bor du// 
32b8(rgyud 'grel): sbrang rtsi sogs la brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas so mig blugs dgra bo yang // bu sdug bzhin du sems par 'gyur// dur khrod gnas su snod chen ni// pad+ma dkar dang chen po'i sdum// brgya dang 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu bzhi bsgrub byas pa'i// mig sman gyis ni gzhan dga' byed// rje btsun ma sgrol ma srid gsum 'gugs pa'i srub thabs rdzogs so// // phyag 'tshal brgya byin me lha 
33a2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa// rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma// 'byung po ro langs dri za rnams dang // gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mdun nas bstod ma// 'jig rten las 'das 'jig rten gyi// tshe rnams
33a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dpal ldan ma// 'jigs chen sdig skyong srid zhi yi// dngos grub ster mdzad mkhas pas bsgom// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas dmar// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje gri// sdigs 
33a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub zhabs bsnams rjes mthun bsgrub// lha tshogs kun la skyon sel ma'o// las sbub 'gro la pha na yid kyis// dben par dkyil 'khor bzang byas te// bgegs bsal
33a5(rgyud 'grel): phrin las gtor ma sbyin// lha mo spyan drangs mchod bstod gsol// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas bsgom par bcas// gnas gsum lus ngag yid sdig bskyon// sdig gzugs bsams la byab 
33a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de rjes bgu dang bsreg par byas// lus bkrus 'dam skyes sdud dang skyes// mkha' la rgyu dang rtsod las rgyal// ngan skyugs rgal spos ltas 'thon nas// sdig ldan gzhan yang sbyang bar 
33a7(rgyud 'grel): bya// na mo rata na tha yA ya// na ma Ar+d+ha ba lo ki te shA rA ya// bo b+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya o tA re tuSh+TA re tu re ma ma sa r+ya pA pa/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi 
33a8(rgyud 'grel): sho d+ha ya// sarba b+ha ba sa mu d+hi ts+yai sha ra yaM swAhA// dngos sam gzugs sam gzugs brnyan la// mi dag kun bsdus stobs bzhir bcas// 'phags pa'i sku gsung thugs bden 
33b1(rgyud 'grel): pas// bdag dang 'gro kun sdig bsal bya// rje btsun ma sgrol ma sdig pa las rnam par rgyal mi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal traT ces bya dang phaT kyis// pha rol 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'joms 
33b2(rgyud 'grel): ma// g.yas bsum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te// me 'bar 'khrugs ma shin tu 'ab ri ma// ma lus rgol 'joms lha mo che// traT phaT sgra yis pha rol gnon// pad+ma ser dang nyi ma la/ 
33b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas bsum g.yon brkyang stang stabs mdzes// tsham rngam gnag cing khros pa'i bzhin// na bza' ser bsnams lto 'gros brgyan// phyag bzhi 'khor lo ral gri dang // skye gnas steng zhags sdig 
33b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mdzad// rjes mthun las kyi 'chi bslus la// de las gong mar 'pho bar bya// phyi nang gsang bas 'gro ba la// srog sbyin tshogs bsag mchod brten bsgrub// lha mo 'dod sbyin yid kyis 
33b5(rgyud 'grel): ltas// sgo gnyis 'jug ldog rlung sbyangs la// sdug mar gnas pa'i yi ge gsum// gcig tu bsdus te steng du 'bang // hi kas lam phye ta ma gis drangs// 'og min longs spyod rdzogs 
33b6(rgyud 'grel): skur 'gyur// dri med chos sku las ma g.yos// sna tshogs gnas su sprul sku 'phro// rje btsun sgrol ma gzhan 'joms 'pho ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // phyag 'tshal dkon mchog 
33b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum mtshon phyag rgya// sor mos thugs kar rnam par brgyan ma// ma lus phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i// rang gi 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'khrug ma// sangs rgyas chos las legs skyes
33b8(rgyud 'grel): shing // dge 'dun kun skyong brtse chen ma// phyogs dang phyogs bral 'khor lo'i bdag/ rang skyes 'od kyis kun skyes bsgom// pad+ma dmar dang zla steng du// pan du ltar dmar phyag bzhi ma/ 
34a1(rgyud 'grel): / gnyis dang gnyis las rab dga' yi// rang bzhin mya ngan med shing 'dzin// rjes mthun las kyi don bsgrub cing // de la mchod tshogs sngon 'gro bas// bsnyen cing bsgrub nas 
34a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bsags te// de nyid gsum gyi byin gyis brlab// byin brlabs ma brlabs yon tan skyon// shes gsal mi gsal bsrung byas te// yongs rdzogs ma Na Da la gsum pa'i tshad// maN+Dal stegs 
34a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs dus bzang brtag/ mchod bstod gsol btab gtor ma sbyin// lha yi rnal 'byor rdzogs ldan pas// dkyil 'khor bris te bum par ni// dbang bskur phyin ni lha rnams bsgrub// oM sarba 
34a4(rgyud 'grel): tathA gta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shrIHye hUM bum pa la bzlas pa bya'o// bruM aM dz+r-i khaM hUM bskyed la// slar yang phyag mtshan lha sbyor las// rigs lnga bsgoms te dbang mchog bskur// zhus byas 
34a5(rgyud 'grel): dris byug kun rdzogs sbyar// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ne hUM swA hA// sku phyi ba'i sngags so// oM A hUM/ dza hUM baM ho// sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang / ye shes pa spyan drang 
34a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags so// de nas man ngag ldan pa yis// mchod nas sngags bzlas spyan phye la// slar yang rab tu rgyas pa'i las// mchod cing sbyin sreg bcas mnga' gsol// oM AHtA re puSh+ped+d+ha 
34a7(rgyud 'grel): paM dI ba gan+d+he nai pi N+ye badz+ra hUM mchod pa'i sngags so// oM tsak+Shu tsaN+Da sa man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ya swA hA// thur mas spyan dbye ba'i sngags so// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra ya swA hA// me tog la bzlas pa dang 
34a8(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i sngags so// oM bruM shrI su khaM badz+ra b+ha pa shI ru d+hiSh+Tha ni khaM bzhugs nas// maN+Dal dbul ba'i sngags so// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg las kun byed// bstan skyong mchod pas bsrung bar byed// 
34b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung 'khor ldan byas gnod med byed// gtor ma rgyas byin rgyas par byed// mchog gi mnga' gsol rab gnas kyis// byin brlabs 'bar dang rgyun ring gnas// gang 'dod dpal ste mthu stobs 'phel// 
34b2(rgyud 'grel): gang bsgrubs de 'dar sangs rgyas 'gyur// rje btsun ma sgron ma mchog stsol ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // phyag 'tshal tu re 'jigs pa chen mo// bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms pa/ 
34b3(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes zhal ni khro gnyer ldan mdzad// dgra bo thams cad rab tu gsod ma// 'jigs chen las skyob 'jigs chen mo// khros pas dgra gsod dgra chen dgra// dbang bskur kun sbyin dbang bdag bsgom// 
34b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar zla gdan chu srin gdan// gser mdog skyil phung byed zhal gcig/ a sho ka dang rin chen mchog/ pad+ma bu ma las dbang mchog ster// rjes mthun las byed nyon mongs kyis// nyon mongs kun 
34b5(rgyud 'grel): sel dbang bsgrub bya// rigs gsum las skyes smin byas te// tshogs sbu gur snying po drang // nyi zla nam mkha' sbrang rtsi'i bcud// lhan cig skyes shes mi 'bral bsgom// zag dang bcas las 
34b6(rgyud 'grel): zag pa med// zhi la 'od gsal dmigs bral dag/ mkhas pas lus dang lus med las// me tog rtsi 'ame til mar ltar// thabs ldan thabs bral legs blangs bsten// mthar ni/ 
34b7(rgyud 'grel): yongs dag mkha' mnyam nyid// rje btsun sgrol ma bdud 'joms dbang ster ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // phyag 'tshal rab tu dga' bar brjid pa'i// dbu rgyan 'od kyi phreng bas spel 
34b8(rgyud 'grel): ma// band pa rab bzad tuta d+hA ra yis// bdud dang 'jig nyer dbang du mdzad ma// ting 'dzin dam pas thugs bsnam ste// dgyes shing dgyes pas rol pa'i sangs// dbu kun lnga le la 'od kyis/ 
35a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhad cing rab bzhad bsgom par bya// pad+mar zla steng b+hu ru'i mdog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi dang po gnyis// spyi bor bcings dang ral gri 'phyar// a sho ka yi yal ga 'dzin// 
35a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes mthun las rnams bsgrub mdzad ma// mnyes byas du mas gsol gtab pas// bgegs gsal gtor ma sngon byin la// sa blang stegs bu bzang po bya// ri rab steng gnas gzhal 
35a3(rgyud 'grel): yas khang // bum pa lnga ldan mchod bstod gsol// dam tshig bskyed la rdzogs par bsgrub// 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas pa bya// mig gnyis nyi ma zla ba yis// phyogs kun bsregs nas lha mo 
35a4(rgyud 'grel): yis// dkyil 'khor dam pa mkha' la blta// badz+ra uts+tsha hUM brjod// 'khyil pa'i sngags brjod gom pa brgyar// rngam par bya ste dra gur bya// 'byung chen lha mo dbang gzhag nas// 
35a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyas par bri// phyogs bzhi nas gus tshig bzhi yis// gsol btab dam tshig ye shes kyis// dkyil 'khor bskyed dang bzhugs sogs bya// pu dang bla ma'i/ 
35a6(rgyud 'grel): drin lan brjod// maN+Dal sngon song so shing sbyin// sngags bcas nyal bas rmi brtags la// lha yid kun ldan rdul tshon dgod// mchod bstod bsgom zhing bzlas sogs bya// oM d+ha 
35a7(rgyud 'grel): rod badz+ra sa ma ya swA hA// gsang bar bsdams te mna' dor la// byin brlabs chu sbyin gdong g.yogs nas// me tog dor te dkyil 'khor gzhug/ rtags ldan brtan pa phyag rgya gdab// 
35a8(rgyud 'grel): oM tA re shun+d+ha re tu ro tsat+ta maN+Da la badz+ra sa mA ya traM/ dkyil 'khor bstan cing gsol btab la// sangs rgyas kun bcu lha mo yi// rnal 'byor kun ldan ye shes lnga'i// dbang bskur slob ma mchog la/ 
35b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin// oM AHbadz+ra daR+sha dz+nyA na a b+hi shiny+tsa mAM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya d+hi dz+nyA na rat+na/ a b+hi Shiny+dza mAM/ oM badz+ra pra ti bik+Sha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM pri t+ya a nuHSh+TA na dz+nyA na he badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM tsakra a 
35b2(rgyud 'grel): maM b+ha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ de nas rdo rje sbyin te/ oM badz+ra sa ma yaHa b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ de nas rgyan bsrung ba sbyin la// oM badz+ra rak+ShaHrak+ShaHhUM a b+hi Shiny+tsA m+me/ lung bstan cing dbugs phyung la/ 
35b3(rgyud 'grel): ai tA rai tut+tA re tu re sid+d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM swa b+hA ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdo rje slob dpon nyid du dbang bskur la/ oM tA re tuSh+TA re tu re he he a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ phyir mi ldog par dbang bskur la/ oM badz+ra be warti 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi She ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur la// oM d+harma rA dza pra ti swA hA// rjes su gnang ba'i dbang bskur la// oM badz+ra a nuny+tsa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ 'di dag slob ma'i dbang 
35b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu ste/ phal cher bum pa la gnas phyir// bum pa'i dbang du brjod pa yin// dang po yang ni thob par byed// de bzhin gsang ba shes rab kyis// dbang bsur bcu yi ye shes dang // sku gsum 
35b6(rgyud 'grel): thob byed bla ma'i zhal// bdud rtsi bzhi pas rdo rje 'dzin// rje btsun sgrol ma mya ngan sel byed kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i yan lag ces bya ba rdzogs so// // phyag 'tshal sa gzhi stong pa'i 
35b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams// thams cad 'gugs par nus pa nyid ma// khro gnyer g.yo ba yi ge hUM gis// phongs pa thams cad rab tu sgrol ma// dpal ldan sa skyong phyogs rnams dang // phyogs thal ma lus 
35b8(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs byed ma// de nyid snying po rab g.yo bas// phongs pa mtha' dag sel mdzad bsgom// rjes mthun cho ga las bsgrubs nas// pad nyi la bzhugs g.yas brkyang rol// mun mdog 
36a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas// lcags kyu gza' 'gugs zhags bsnams 'ching // dpa' mo bsnyen pas 'gro phan yid// brgya rtsa brgyad ni gus bsgoms la// pad+ma 'am bi la 
36a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras de bzhin du// ka ra bi ra'i sems mchod bya// bum bzang snod du lnga phrag lnga// rin chen gzugs spras snying po gzug/ gang 'dod bzhir ni bgegs bsal la// lha mo nor gyi dbang phyug rten/ 
36a3(rgyud 'grel): oM tA re tut+tA re tu re dza b+he mo he swA hA// rje btsun sgrol ma 'gro ba 'gugs shing phongs pa sel ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // phyag 'tshal zla ba'i dum bus dbu brgyan// brgyan pa tham 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): cad shin tu 'bar ma// ral pa'i khung na 'od dpag med las// rtag par shin tu 'od rab mdzad ma// gang gis gsol btab bkra shis dang // dge legs rgyas mdzad zla tshes brgyan// 'od
36a5(rgyud 'grel): dpag med las 'od 'dzags pas// bsod nams 'od dpung 'bar mdzad bsgom// mtshan mas rjes mthun las bsgrub nas// slar yang chu skyes ri bong can// rdo rje'i skyil dkrung gis gnon dpal// 
36a6(rgyud 'grel): gser mdog zhal cig phyag brgyad blta// rtse gsum lcags kyu rdo rje gri// rin chen lcags kyi dbyu gu ri la// thugs rjes tshar gcod rjes 'dzin ma// rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod ster ma'o// 
36a7(rgyud 'grel): shi ba'i phyogs su thab brtsigs te// dbus su taM ldan uta pa la bskor// sreg rdzas g.yas dang mchod rdzas g.yon// 'o ma can shing sbrang rtsi mar// bsangs te so sor byin gyis brlab// 
36a8(rgyud 'grel): rin chen las byas tshad ldan gyi// dgang gzar thugs gzar rdo rje dril// bsangs te ku shas gcal bkral bya// rgyun zhags bram ze'i mes spar la// bsang zhing rlung yab kyis bskyod bya// 
36b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i ched du lan gsum gsum// bdag med byin za mchod nas bstim// pad+ma'i 'dug stangs lan gnyis te// gsum gsum gyis ni lan bdun du// mar gyi dgang blugs gus pas sbyin// rnal 'byor/ 
36b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas rtse gcig go/ oM a ka ne ye a d+hi bya a b+hi sa ma ya rA shrI ye r+ya bya ka bya ma hA ka na swA hA// me blta sa ngan na bgegs dgra bzlog/ bzang na gsol btab dngos grub blang // sdig ldan 
36b3(rgyud 'grel): spangs nas gso sbyong can// gus shing snying rje ldan par mchod// oM a b+hi b+hak+Sha ag+na ye ma ma shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// de rjes dgang thugs zhabs bsil bya// mchod bstod 'dod don gsol ba gdag/ 
36b4(rgyud 'grel): de rjes lha bskyed sogs mchod nas// dgang blugs phul la rdzas rnams mchod// na mo rat+na tra ya ya/ na ma ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa tra ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ 
36b5(rgyud 'grel): oM tA de tut+tA re tu re ma ma shIn+tiM ku ru swA hA// dgang blugs dbul zhing mchod bstod la// slar yang me lha bskyes rdzas dbul// mchod bstod bshags shing byang chub bsngo// kun don phrin

36b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas ma// g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum kun 'khor dga' ba'i// dgra yid phung ni rnam par 'joms ma// smin byed rlag byed dpa' mo ni// mi bzang mo dpung dbus na brjid// rten byed sdang byang 
36b8(rgyud 'grel): dga' mdzad cing // 'joms byed drag gzugs can de bsgom// pad+ma dmar dang nyi ma la// bzhengs pa'i dor stabs brkyang bskum ma// mi bzad rA ga ltar dmar mdog/ kun tu 'phro zhing 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): kun bsreg mdzad// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mchu smin g.yo// ral gri mda' dang 'khor lo gzhu// gcod 'bigs gshog cing bsnun byed las// bgegs dgra pra rab rdul mi 
37a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas// gser mdog nor bu in+d+ra dang // srur long 'phags pa'i gdung thal dang // bri ha ta dang gu gul dang // bdud rtsi lnga sogs sbyar ba'i spos// rnal 'byor ldan pas bdug byas na// stong

37a5(rgyud 'grel): zhag gis tshangs par gyur kyang gsod// oM tA re tut+tA re tu ro d+ha ma d+ha re sa hUM/ s+pho Ta b+ha smi ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA// rje btsun ma sgrol ma yongs su smin pas dgra bgegs gzhom pa'i sgrub

37a8(rgyud 'grel): ma// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar khros pa'i zhal// thod pa'i do shal rgyu ma gsol// sbrul brgyad kyis brgyan stag lpags gsol// phyag drug ral gri lcags kyu dang // dbyu gu de bzhin thod khrag bkang / 
37b1(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo 'dzin ma// khams gsum rim bdun cig char 'gems// rjes mthun las rnams sngon song bas// dar kar dril byug lha sbyor gyis// chu skyes ge sar oM dang a'i/ 
37b2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' rten mda' brgyad 'bru brgyad bri// bden bzhi'i rten 'brel 'thab skor dang // rigs lnga'i snying pos brgyan pa yi// sna tshogs rdo rje mdzes pa dang // A li kA li mu khyud bskor// mthar byed sngag

37b4(rgyud 'grel): bdug pas bdug cing mgul du gdags// 'di yis mi bsrung gang yang med// rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'gugs byed mas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // phyag 'tshal bde ma dge ma zhim// mya ngan 
37b5(rgyud 'grel): 'das shing spyod yul nyid ma// swA hA oM dang yang dag ldan ma// sdig pa chen po 'joms pa nyid ma// lha mo bde mas mtho ris sbyin// dge mas thar pa sbyin pa ste// de bzhin zhi mas rdzogs sangs rgyas// 
37b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin mdzad sdig 'joms bsgom par bya// pad+ma dkar dang zla ba la// rdo rje skyil dkrung kun da'i mdog/ phreng ba mchod sbyin dbyug gu dang // pad+ma spyi thugs po ting 'dzin// rtsa ba'i bsnyen ldan khrus byas te/ 
37b7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bsal bsod nams spel phyir ro// lha sbyor ldan dang rdzas tshang dang // dad dang snying rje brtson pas nyid// nyams dga'i phyogs su stegs bu bcas// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab bzhi ldan// rdo rje me phreng mdzes/ 
37b8(rgyud 'grel): bskor zhing // phyogs skyong bkra shis rtags ldan gri// ral gri me tog mda' dang dar// rma bya tshon skud dung dkar sogs// ba dan bla re rgyal mtshan gdugs// me tog phreng sogs mchod gtor bsham/ 
38a1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i ting 'dzin las sprul pa// rin chen khang brtsegs rgya chen nang // dngos grub mtsho skyes bcom ldan ma// cho ga gsum gyi bskyed gzhug mchod// na mo rat+na tra yA ya// na mo At+ma/ 
38a2(rgyud 'grel): b.lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sanA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba gra he de sarba bya d+hi sarba/ tsho ra sarba biH/ sarba duR+sha b+hA ni b+h+ya/ sarba pA paM pra shA ma nA ya swA hA// rig pa'i rgyal 
38a3(rgyud 'grel): mo'i mtha' skor du// gzugs mdzes kyis ni brgya stong grangs// bskor zhing 'phro 'dra'i 'od 'bar bas// bzhu ste bdud rtsi'i rdzing bur byas// dug sel sgros bya ba sdig gdon sogs// mi sdug 
38a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su byung byas khrus// rig sngags bkra shis bcas te gdon// rjes la mchod stod bzod par gsol// lan cig lan gsum lnga dang bdun// khrus byas nad sel gdon zhi byed// sdig 'joms don 
38a5(rgyud 'grel): kun sgrub 'gyur te// rtag tu byas na dngos grub thob// rje btsun sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo phyi khrus kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // phyag 'tshal kun nas bskor rab dga' ba'i// dgra yi dpung ni 
38a6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'gems ma// yi ge bcu pa'i ngag ni bkod pas// rig pa hU~M las sgrol ba nyid pa// yid gzhung dran sogs kun nas bskor// mi shes dgra dpung rab 'joms ma// blo gros yi ge bcu 
38a7(rgyud 'grel): bkod pas// hUM las srid zhi'i mun sgrol bsgom// pad+ma'i ge sar nyi ma la// sems dpa'i skyil krung b+hu ru'i mdog/ dgra 'joms rtse gsum thugs kar 'dzin// 'bras bcas shing bsnams
38a8(rgyud 'grel): sdigs mdzub 'phyar// thugs kyi snying po rig pa mchog/ yi ge bcu bskor 'dod pa yi// dngos grub kun ster blo gros spel// thams cad snying gi gnas ma'o// thugs rje'i rang bzhin shes 
38b1(rgyud 'grel): rab mchog/ gcig tu phan mdzad dngos grub sbyin// ji ltar gzhan blo spel de ltar// bdag gis blo mchog rgyas pas mdzad// ngag gis dbang phyug zhi phra dmar// bdag gyur g.yas g.yon mdun rgyab du// 
38b2(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhungs dran dang shes rab dang // blo 'phel lha mo bzhi bsgom bya// srid pa'i 'khor lo zla ba'i dbus// rnam snang sgrol ma las byung dngos// rtsa rig 'od kyi mun sel bskyed// mi smra'i sbyor bas gsang
38b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re hrIHma hA ma yAM ga pradz+nyA bad+d+hi ma hA sa ra sa/ t+yo na ma pra ti ta pa ri bud+d+ho sa taHsarba d+harmA pra ta ta pa r-i shud+d+ho&haM/ sarba ma hA b+ha yan+ta ra swA hA/ sman rnams sbyor bas bzas 
38b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// zla ba drug dang gsum ma ma gcig/ zos na thos ming 'dzin pa dang // tshe ldan tshangs pa'i nga ro thob// de bzhin gser mdog dri ldan sngags// zla gcig zla gsum zla ba drug/ bsnyen pas yid 
38b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhung dran ldan zhing // blo 'phel ngag gi dbang phyug 'gyur// rje btsun sgrol ma dgra 'joms mas blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // phyag 'tshal tu re zhabs kyis brdabs pas/ 
38b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma// ri rab man+dA ra dang 'bigs byed// 'jig rten gsum rnams g.yo ba nyid ma// bde ldan lha mos zhabs brdabs pas// 'jig rten gsum g.yo 'jigs par 
38b7(rgyud 'grel): byed// hUM yig sa bon las skyes mgon// ri rab kun bskyod dbang bsdud bsgom// rab dkar pad dbus nyi ma la// hUM yig las skyes kun bde ster// sems dpa'i skyil krung dmar 
38b8(rgyud 'grel): ser mdzes// phyag gnyis ri bong 'dzin bsnams pa'o// de bsnyen dben par gtsang khang bsham// zhi mdzad lha la me tog gi/ maN+Dal mchod bcas gtor mar bcas// de bzhin 
39a1(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo me mchod bcas// chom rkun la sogs snying brtse bas// lha mo gtor ma 'dod byin la// yan lag dgu ldan mchor byas nas// zhi drug gnyi gar slob pa gdab// sring 
39a2(rgyud 'grel): ka'i 'od kyis sems can khams// kun skyabs slar yang thugs rje yi// a las bsil zer de steng tAM// yongs gyur sngar gzugs lha mo yi// g.yas g.yon mi 'jigs ut+pal can// 
39a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rgyan mdzes lha rdzas kyis// mchod sprin dbus bzhugs che dgus mchor// mgul rgyan gdub bu do shal 'dzin// 'bru gsum gyis brgyan nam mkha' yi// tshon gzugs dang bltas 
39a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar bya// phyag gi bdud rtsis bdag spong bar// bsams la gsang sngags lo grangs gdon// na mau A r+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya// bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ne kA ya/ 
39a5(rgyud 'grel): taHdz+nyA/ oM t+tA rI tut+tA re tu ro sarba duHnyan pr-i duSh+pAn mA ma bi tAnA/ dab+hU ya/ s+t+rai b+hU ya/ mo hA ya/ ban+d+ha/ ban+ti ya/ d+hun+ma d+hA parde ga pa/ sarba sta~M b+ban tA ra swA hA// byi yi phyag rgya zhabs 'og man 
39a6(rgyud 'grel): gang gi dbugs kyis drangs te bsreg/ sgrub bya'i 'khor lo bcings te dril// de skyong lnga ni gter ma saM bskrad// gang 'gro'i phyogs su dpal chen mo// zhal bzang bdag la gzigs 
39a7(rgyud 'grel): par bsam// de la bstod dang bzlas gsol bya// des ni 'jigs pa kun skyob 'gyur// rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma/ bde ldan mas chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// 
39a8(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lha yi mtsho yi rnam pa'i// ri dgas rtags can phyag na bsnams pa// tAr gnyis brjod paT kyis yi ges// dug rnams ma lus pa ni sel ma// 'phags ma lha yi dang po 'dzin/ 
39b1(rgyud 'grel): zag med pade rgyas dug sel ma// mnyes byas rdzas dang sngags stong bas// drag rnams las rgyal bsgom par bya// pang ma dkar steng tha bus su// 'dab bzang khri sted skyil lung bzhugs// gnyis kyi

39b3(rgyud 'grel): zagag sum bzlas gnas lngar thug/ oMt+mA trat+tA ra tsa dku ru grA d+hI arba shad+d+ha b+hak+Sha ya hU hUM na ga tad+ha ya mo pA ya ban+d+ha ye ra ya Ni mu na ra ba nAd+hA hU~M phaT phaT swAhA// dam tshig rjes dang ba la/

39b5(rgyud 'grel): sgog su ma d+hur// me yaM bcud dang rus pa'i blo// me yi bcud bsdus ril bu'o// snga ma'i gnyis 'byung bsnyen pa yis// ren pa nyid dang lha sbyor nyid// gsum pa la ni gsum 'gyur nyid// gnan 
39b6(rgyud 'grel): zla drug bdud rtse bsnyen// bzhi pa yang na bzhe 'gyur nyid// klu drug rnam rgyal bskyed par bya// lnga pa lnga 'grupas rdung // mi bskyod gtso khyad par bsten// nyi 'od mun pa me yi rdul//

40a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs mchod sngon 'gro// gsol btab snying brtses bsnyen pa gso// khri brtson lo grangs brgya rtsa brgyad// mchod bstod gsol ba ma yengs bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shA 
40a4(rgyud 'grel): rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ye/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ re dzA b+ha d+har+m+me/ nir+yA te/ ta re ta ra ya/ thug pa ti traSh+ThA tA re b+ha ma b+hA ya me tse d+ha re swA hA// rje btsun sgrol ma sdug bsngal sre/

41a1(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma sgrol ma yongs su rdzogs byed mas mkha' spyod kyis sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // 'phags mchod lha mo yid sbyin dbang gi rgyal po 'di// nyi shu gcig bcas bstod pa'i rgyal

41b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal rab tu dpa' ba'i sgrol ma// spros med rnam dag nam mkha'i dkyil na// pad+ma gser mdog gdan la bzhugs pa'i// sku mdog dmar mo me yi 'od can//

43b5(rgyud 'grel): blag 'tshal smin par byed pa'i sgrol ma// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i dbus su// ny+tsA ma pad+ma dmar po'i gdan la// bzhengs pa'i dang skabs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum// phyag 'tshal sku mchog 
43b6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mi bzang// pad+ma rAg lta bur dmar zhing // dpa' ba'i cha byad zhal gcig phyag bzhi// drag mo chen mo dgra dpung 'joms ma// phyag 'tshal g.yas kyi dang po ral gri// gnyis pa mda' yis nyon
43b7(rgyud 'grel): mongs 'bigs ma// g.yon pa 'khor lo gnyis pa gzhu thogs// mchu dang smin ma khro gnyer gyen rlog/ phyag 'tshal khro gnyer g.yo ba'i sgrol ma// nyi ma pad+ma dmar po'i gdan la// g.yas brkyang 
43b8(rgyud 'grel): gar gyis mi ro mnan nas// sku mdog nag mo 'jigs gzugs ldan ma// phyag 'tshal zhal dang smin ma rab bsdus// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar khro gnyer dang ldan// dmar ba'i spyan gsum sdang mig 
44a1(rgyud 'grel): rab dgrad// mi yi chu ma zhal du gsol ma// phyag 'tshal sbrul dang s+thagi gos gsol// thod pa'i cod pan mgo bo'i do shal// ral gri dbyug gu lugs gru bsnams nas// g.yon pa thod mgo 
44a2(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa 'dzin ma// phyag 'tshal dge legs zhi ba'i sgrol ma// pad+ma dkar po zla ba'i gdan la// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i mdog can// zhal gcig phyag drug sdig pa 'joms ma// phyag 'tshal don rtogs 
44a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi dang po// rgyal ba'i spyod yul thugs kar phreng 'dzin// gnyis pa na ni legs pa'i phyag rgya// gsum pa'i phyag gis dbyu gu 'dzin ma// phyag 'tshal g.yon gyi dang po pad ma// gnyis pa na ni ril
44a4(rgyud 'grel): ba spyi lugs// gsum pa 'dab rgyas ut+pal steng du// 'gro ba'i lam ston po ti bsnams ma// phyag 'tshal chags pa 'joms pa'i sgrol ma// pad+ma dmar po nyi ma'i gdan la// spros med sems dpa'i skyil krung // 
44a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes brjid// zhal gcig sbyar gsum b+ha ru'i mdog can// phyag 'tshal hUM gis rig pa dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i phyag gnyis// g.yas pa'i rtse gsum thugs kar bsdams nas/ 
44a6(rgyud 'grel): dgra'i lus la rab tu bsdun mo// phyag 'tshal g.yon pas sdigs mdzum rab 'phyar// snying po 'bras bur bcas pa'i shing 'dzin// thugs kyi snying po yi ge bcu pas// dgos pa'i dngos grub ma lus 'byung 
44a7(rgyud 'grel): ma// phyag 'tshal bde ba sgrub pa'i sgrol ma// pad+ma dkar po 'bar ba'i steng du// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i gdan la// sems dpa'i skyil krung dpa' bar bzhugs ma// phyag 'tshal bde ba'i sku mdog dmar 
44a8(rgyud 'grel): ser// zhal gcig phyag gnyis hUM gis phrin las// 'jig rten gsum po dbang du bsdus nas// bde ba thams cad grub par mdzad ma// phyag 'tshal thogs med nam mkha'i lus can// phyag gnyis 
44b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhabs kyi mnan nas// rin chen du ma'i rgyan gyis mdzes ma// phyag 'tshal rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrol ma// pad+ma dkar po steng gi zla ba'i// dkyil 'khor dbus na 
44b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dab bzang ngang pa'i// steng du sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhugs ma// phyag 'tshal zag med bde chen rab rgyas// sku mdog dkar mo dung gi mdangs 'byar// zhal gcig phyag bzhi tA ra gnyis brjod// yi ge 
44b3(rgyud 'grel): phaT kyis dug rnams sel ma// phyag 'tshal dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan// phyag gnyis spyi bor lcags kyu rab 'dzin// g.yas 'og mchod sbyin g.yon gyi gnyis pa// ut+pal steng du po te bsdams ma// 
44b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal sdug bsngal sreg byed sgrol ma// pad dkar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na// bde ba'i stan la sems dpa'i skyil krung // cung zad g.yas brkyang par ni bzhugs ma// phyag 'tshal dkar mo dung gi 
44b5(rgyud 'grel): mdangs ldan// sna tshogs dkar dmar 'od zer phreng bas// 'gying bag sku la rab tu brgyan nas// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs ma lus sel ma// phyag 'tshal bden gnyis dag pa'i phyag rgya// phyag gnyis thugs 
44b6(rgyud 'grel): kar me thab bsdams nas// sdug bsngal ma lus bsreg par mdzad cing // 'gro rnams thar pa'i lam la 'god ma// phyag 'tshal dngos grub 'byung ba'i sgrol ma// sku mdog dmar ser las kyi rigs
44b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshon// pad+ma dkar po steng gi zla ba'i// dkyil na sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhugs ma// phyag 'tshal dpa' mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis// zabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i phyag rgya// thugs kar gser 
44b8(rgyud 'grel): gyi bum pa bsnams ma// dngos grub ma lus par ni ster ma// phyag 'tshal bum pa bzang dang nor bu// 'dod 'jo'i ba dang dpag bsam shing chen// khyod zhabs dran pas 'dod dgu 'byung 'gyur// gang
44b9(rgyud 'grel): sa pa ma ma sam mamamamamamasams mamamamamamasaca masas mas mam mamamatha ma pa pa lamams pa ma ya ma sa ma mams cas samapa thamamamamamamapasam ca mam ma tham mamasasas pa tha sa pa la rang yang nga pa ma sa sam mamamamam mas ma ma ma sa ma yang mam thams la tham 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): la ci 'dod re ba skong ma// phyag 'tshal yongs su rdzogs byed sgrol ma// ha las skyes pa'i khru mchog steng du// pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gdan la// byed skyil rol pa'i 'dug stangs mdzes brjid// 
45a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal dkar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gzigs ma// zhe sdang ma spangs gnas su dag phyir// dur khrod stag gi sham thabs bcings ma// phyag 'tshal g.yas 
45a3(rgyud 'grel): pas mu tig phreng 'dzin// thugs rje mi zad rab tu khros pas// g.yon pa'i phyag na rtse gsum mdung thogs// dug gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu la bsnun ma// zla ba yang ngo'i tshes brgyad dag la// gang gis 
45a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag gtsug gis nor bu// bstod pa'i rgyal po gus pa'i blo yis// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na// rgyal po sbrul dang srin po mi rgod// me dang chu dang stag dang seng ge/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad 
45a5(rgyud 'grel): las grol 'gyur// mu ge nad dang 'byung pos tshe ba// sdug bsngal yid mi bde las grol 'gyur// sdig pa chen po rnams dang skal ngan// 'khrug dang 'thab rtsod nyes pa mi 'byung // nyon mongs mya ngan
45a6(rgyud 'grel): gdung ba rnams sel// sa 'og gter dang mig sman ri lu// rkang mgyogs la sogs dngos grub brgyad thog/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbang phyug/ rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro gnas la sogs pa'i// dbang
45a7(rgyud 'grel): phyug las la dga' ba ma yin// bdag por byed dang dga' mgur bsgrub pa'i// 'dod dgu 'byung ba'i dngos grub dam pa// de bzhin yon tan brgyad kyang thob 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam
45a8(rgyud 'grel): shing dang // dpal ldan 'dod 'jo'i ba dang bum mchog/ bde ba dang bcas nor rnams 'grub 'gyur// mtshan mo chu dang lto 'bye 'thung po// sha za'i tshogs kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug

45b3(rgyud 'grel): pas mu tig phreng 'dzin// thugs rje mi zad rab tu khros pas// g.yon pa'i phyag na rtse gsum mdung thogs// dug gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu la bsnun ma// zla ba yar ngo'i tshes brgyad dag la// gang gis 
45b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag gtsug gis nor bu// bstod pa'i rgyal po gus pa'i blo yis// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na// rgyal po sbrul dang srin po mi rgod// me dang chu dang stag dang seng ge/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad

45b6(rgyud 'grel): gdung ba rnams sel// sa 'og gter dang mig sman ri lu// rkang mgyogs la sogs dngos grub brgyad thog/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbang phyug/ rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro gnas la sogs pa'i// dbang
45b7(rgyud 'grel): phyug las la dga' ba ma yin// bdag por byed dang dga' mgur bsgrub pa'i// 'dod dgu 'byung ba'i dngos grub dam pa// de bzhin yon tan brgyad kyang thob 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam
45b8(rgyud 'grel): shing dang // dpal ldan 'dod 'jo'i ba dang bum mchog/ bde ba dang bcas nor rnams 'grub 'gyur// mtshan mo chu dang lto 'phye 'byung po// sha za'i tshogs kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug/ 
46a1(rgyud 'grel): zeng mdzes tshig gi me tog mchod par bshes// skal ldan rigs can lam mtshon med pa zhig/ rang yul ma sleb ri dgas rgyal pos bdas// khom ldan skyes bu gsum la skyabs 'gro 
46a2(rgyud 'grel): byas// sgrol mas rjes bzung seng ges gus phyag btsal// don gnyer 'gron la gdong dmar gangs ri'i mdog/ rdul 'dzag rab khros khro gnyer mche ba gtsigs// byin brlabs mthar thug gzungs 
46a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags bstod pa'i mthus// de ma thag tu glang chen 'jigs las skyabs// shing rkam khri la tshe zad brgya gzhag ste// log lha'i rgyal pos drang srong me lha mchod// thams cad mkhyen pas me tog phreng 'dzin 
46a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// dngos su zhal bstan bdud rtsi'i char rgun phab// tshong dpon nor ldan shul rings lam du zhugs// 'jigs pa'i thang la mi rgod chom rkun byung // yi dam lha mos 'jigs med bde sar bstsal// 
46a5(rgyud 'grel): drilan ma brjed rten la mchod pa phul// gzugs mdzes bu mos phyir rol nags su phyin// dug sbrul gdug pa'i kha rlangs sprin ltar 'thibs// 'thas ldan ldon pa'i shing gi bsil grib la// spyi bor 
46a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gzhag mi bzad nad las thar// sbyin pa'i 'bras med dbul phongs rkun po'i mis// dkor mdzod blangs pas btson khang ra bar bcug/ dad ldan slob mas thugs dam rgyud bskul bas/ 
46a7(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i phyag gis lcags sgrog mdud pa bkrol// tsan+d+ra go mi dge bsnyen 'phags pa mchog/ rgyal po'i chad pas gad+hA'i chu la sbyar// gus ldan zhes bcas pa'i sdeb sbyor gyis// 'dzum zhal dge 
46a8(rgyud 'grel): mas sing+ga'i gling la bzhag/ rgyal bcud lam 'khrul dur khrod gnas su 'khyams// log 'dren 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin gyir che// rigs pa'i rgyal po rig sngags bcu bzlas pa// bar chad bdud 
46b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis tshogs las rgyal bar gyur// seng ge glang chen me dang chom rkun dang // dug sbrul btson khang chu dang 'byung po'i gdon// 'dus byas rgya mtsho las 'bras 'jug ngogs can// byang sems klu dbang bden 
46b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gtsug gi nor// pha rol phyin drug rin chen rgyan gyis spras// lnga bcu lhun grub phrin las gzi brjid can// 'jigs brgyad sgrol ma gzhan yang sems can gyi// phyi rol grub mtha' ngan pa log lta'i 
46b3(rgyud 'grel): ri// lung rigs rdo rje'i mtshon gyis bcom nas kyang // lus ngag yid gsum sku gsum dkon mchog gsum// yang dag mtha' bral lta ba ma rtogs na// tshig gi bsnyems pas don la mi rnyog 
46b4(rgyud 'grel): te// sems kyi gnas lugs nam mkha'i chos nyid la// ma rig 'khrul pa'i dra ba bsal du gsol// bsod nams chung bas dge ba'i sems med cing // mi dge mun bsgribs yang dag lam ma
46b5(rgyud 'grel): rnyed// bdag 'dzin bdud kyi srid mtsho 'dir 'khyams rnams// bshes gnyen thabs mkhas gru gzings ded dpon can// chu bzhi'i pha rol yid 'ong po ta la// bde mchog gnas chen lha yi pho brang 
46b6(rgyud 'grel): du// 'gro kun yan lag bdun ldan chos spyod cing // nyer 'kho'i yo byad dka' babs brgyad gnang nas// phrin las lha mos zhal ba zhes ma bsnyel bar// bshes gnyen ngan pa'i bdud dang mjal
46b7(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams// dal 'byor chud zos mi tshe stong zad cing // zas nor don med gsus su brlag gyur pa// lus sems sdug bsngal chu yi rba rlabs kyis// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i sems can ma 
46b8(rgyud 'grel): lus dang // bka' 'bangs tha ma bdag cag thams cad la// rnam dag zos bsam sgom gsum bstan du gsol// rnam dag thos bsam sgom gsum bstan nas kyang // phan pa de'i dge ba 
47a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog tu bsngo// khyod kyi phrin las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de// chags sdang gti mug sprin gyi grib ma yis// bsgribs par ma gyur dpal ldan 'phags ma'i sku// dge tshogs 
47a2(rgyud 'grel): sprin chen lhun po'i rtser bzhugs la// sa 'dzin spo la rta bdun rgyal po ltar// lham me lhang nge gsal ba'i bkra shis shog/ gtsang ba dag bde dang rtag pa nyid thob pa// skye rgan che med pa chos kyi su// 
47a3(rgyud 'grel): brnyes gyur lhun gyis grub cing 'dus ma byas// bsam zhing brjod pa'i yul las 'das gyur kyang // chu nang zla ba nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin du// sbrul skus 'gro don mdzad par smon lam 'debs// 
47a4(rgyud 'grel): klu sgrub pad+mo'i ge sar la// nyi ma sbas pa bung ba yi// lang ling bdud rtsi'i dga' ston gyis// bu slob sbrang bu'i lus rgyas shog// kha che'i slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas rje btsun sgrol ma 
47a5(rgyud 'grel): la bstod pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta sA d+hu kIn+ti dang // bod kyi lo tsa ba 'dan ma tshul khrims seng ges bsgyur ba las// phyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du dag par
47a6(rgyud 'grel): byas so// // @#/ zeng ba 'dzin pa'i stod pa gzugs/ @#rgya gar skad du/ sra ga d+ha ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 
47a7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba ltar dmar lha mchog rnams kyi mgo yi gtsug gi nor bu'i dpal// phun sum tshogs pas dmar ba smag rtsi gsal po dngar bkod shin tu yun rings ma lon
47a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dra'i// 'phags ma khyod zhabs dag la thal sbyar cod pan gyis mnan yan lag mchog thud bdag gis ni// gus pas sgrol ma phongs skyabs bstod pa gser gyi me tog phreng ba rnams 
47b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod par bgyid// skal ngan du ba'i bzhin ldan rgal bar dga' ba'i sdug bsngal me la lus dag rnam lhung ba// ci dang ci bya zhes rmongs lan cig min pa'i rtsom pa byas kyang 'bras dang 
47b2(rgyud 'grel): bral bas skyo// mkha' la nyi zla'i dpal ni gzhan las mang du thos nas blta ba re ba bcas gyur pa'i// mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gro ba lta bu bdag ni sdig 'joms khyed la gus pas brten par 
47b3(rgyud 'grel): bgyid// khyed kyi thugs rje sems can las rnams kun la bye brag med par 'jug pa ma lags sam// de dag bzung bas bdag 'dra yang ni de dag nang du bzung bar 'gyur la gdon mi za// 
47b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dag 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i mun par cha zer can gzugs nus pa la dozla med// de lta mod kyi kye ma bdag smad nyes byas ngan pas brjid cing sdug bsngal ldan pa nyid// skal ba zhan pa bdag 
47b5(rgyud 'grel): smad smad pa zhig ste nyin byed 'od zer gyis kyang mun pa sel// gangs can las byung 'jug dogs chus dkrigs kha ba'i dum bu 'khyags shing bsil ba dag tu skom// rin chen 
47b6(rgyud 'grel): gling gi lam srang dang ni nor bu'i phug yang sa khang pa dag gi nang du dbul// 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig ma khyod mgon du byas kyang mgon ma mchis so bcom ldan ma// nu ma'i 
47b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyu las lan mang dag tu rnam par du ba'i bu la ma yang skyo bar 'gyur// nyi ma so sor dam pa ma yin don gnyer rnams la rab bskul pa yang khro ba 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum gyi
47b8(rgyud 'grel): ro 'dod 'bras bus yangs ldan dpag pas ma shing chen 'khri shing mchog ni khyod// mngon par don gnyer don rnams kun la stsol gyi nam yang rnam gyur de dag ci yang med// gang la 
48a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs tshogs kyis me 'bar lus can de dang de yi sgrol ma nga nyid ces// bdag nyid zhal bzhes dam bcas sdug bsngal 'og tu bying ba bdag la 'bras bu ldan par mdzod// 
48a2(rgyud 'grel): srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal shugs ni rtsub cing zil gnon 'di dag ji snyed 'phel gyur pa// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg par smon lam tho mdzad rnams kyi brtse ba'ang de snyed 
48a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid// de ltar bstod pa'i tshig gi zol gyis tshe de'i sgra dag gsang mthon sgrogs cing lag bsgreng la// gzhan dag gis kyang btang snyoms bya bar 'os pa min na yum gcig khyod kyis la 
48a4(rgyud 'grel): yang ci// gzhan dag rnams kyi mngon 'dod 'byor par don gnyer 'dod pa khyed las thob pa rnams mthong bzhin// mi dge las byung nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags bzod blags med pas 
48a5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu yang yang sreg/ gal te kho bo sdig can lags na khyod la gus pa chen po 'di ni ci phyir 'phel// khyod nyid gcig pu'i mtshan gyis kyang ni thos dang dran pas 'phral la sdig 
48a6(rgyud 'grel): pa sel bar byed// de lta na yang bdag gi bya ba'i khur dag dor ba ji ltar lags zhes bden gsungs pa// nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur yang sman pa'i snying rje rgya chen phan pa 'khon par bgyid/ 
48a7(rgyud 'grel): dam cing // sgra dang ser sna nga rgyal phrag dog rang skyon tha chad rnams kyis dus mnyam rim par yang // du ma dag gi thun mong char gyur tshogs khang rnga mo bzhin du bskor bar gyur 
48a8(rgyud 'grel): pas na// khyed kyi zhabs pad mchod pa skad cig tsam yang ma rnyed gang de'i don du khyad par las// phongs pas yi ge dman par tshig 'di bkod do bdag gi 'dod pa don med ma// 
48b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ dus mtha'i rlung rab 'khrugs pas dkrugs pa'i chu ni g.yo zhing 'gul pa'i rlung 'khor ral pa can// rab 'khrugs kun tu bskyod cing rba rlabs ngos brdabs sgra grags gad brgyangs 
48b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po sgrogs pa las// gru chag chu ru snying rje ngu ba'i cho nge dang ldan g.yo ba med cing zhan gyur pa// lha mo khyod la bstod pa rnams kyis 'phral la chu gter 'gram du rang dga' thar par
48b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// du ba 'tshubs pa sprin 'dra khongs nas rab byung me stag 'khar khyim nang du rnam par rgyu// 'phro zhing rab 'bar drag po'i 'bar byed shugs dag 'jug pa'i khang par mal stan
48b4(rgyud 'grel): la 'khod pa// thal sbyar cod pan ldan pas khyed la bdud byas lngab ldib dag tu gsol ba 'debs pa rnams// glog rab 'gyur ba'i brtse dga' rab 'bar chu 'dzin shugs kyi skad cig 
48b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid la sgrib par byed// myos pa'i chu rgyas 'gram pa gnyis ka'i ngos la babs pas bung ba dag gi phreng ba can// hUM zhes bya bas bos par gyur pa'i glang chen zla bos zhe sdang me sbar 
48b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'thung gi/ so rtse rab tu mtho ba'i khyogs la blangs pa'i lus can dag gis khyod rjes dran pa na// rtse mo che ldan mgo rtse'i rdzong la 'du gang cing rab tu dga' bas 'chi bdag phyir zlog
48b7(rgyud 'grel): byed// mdungs rings drag po bsnun gsad mi yi mgo dang gsal shing dag gi khri shing dga' ston can// nags tshal spong par chom rkun lag gtses ral gri g.yo zhing brdeg par bzas 
48b8(rgyud 'grel): pas dregs rgyas pa// khro gnyer dang bcas smin 'khyog zur mig gis bltas mig can rnams ni khyed mtshan dpal gyi gzhi// gsal bar 'dri ba'i gnas la bsam pa'i smyu gu skyon med rnams 
49a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis zan du skol bar byed// rab rno sder mo'i rtse ni rdo rje lta bu bsnun pas glang chen myos pa'i klad 'gems nas// khrag mang rab tu zags pas bkrus pa'i ral pa gsal po 
49a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs rung yangs phrag pa khebs// khros te rgyang nas steng du mchod 'dod mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha can ri dgas dgra// khyod la 'os pa'i bstod pa don ldan tshig dag bkod pas skrag ste log 
49a3(rgyud 'grel): nas 'gro bar 'gyur// gdengs can rnam 'gyur du ba 'khyil dang mun pa'i dbyibs can gsal par phung sgra dag gi tshogs// byed pa dang ldan kha gangs ro 'dzin thag pa gshin rje'i zhags 'dra che zhing g.yo 
49a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dag/ sdig pa las byung slar yang khyod skyong bdag nyid khyod kyi yon tan bgrang ba lhur len pas// ud pa la phreng ba'i rgyan gyis 'byor ba bung ba myos pa'i phreng bas dkris ltar 'dzin par 'gyur// 
49a5(rgyud 'grel): rje bo'i smin ma bskyod pas 'jigs pa dag gis rgod cing 'phyar bas drangs la tse do gzings// g.yo zhing sgra sgrogs zan khol rnams kyis rtsub mor smra byed zhags pa'i mdud pa dam pos bcings// 
49a6(rgyud 'grel): bkres skom dag gis kha dang mgrin skams gang zhig 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba// de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis sngags kyang mtha' med rgud pa de dag 'phral du gtong bar 'gyur/ 
49a7(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma sprul pa'i las kyi rim pas rnam par 'gyur ba dag gi chas byas shing // log pa'i gzugs tsam rjes su 'tsham pa'i mtshon cha'i 'od zer tshogs ni rab tu mi bzang ldan// mi ro las
49a8(rgyud 'grel): bton rgyu ma'i zag pa'i tshogs kyi phreng bas rnam par spras pa'i srin po rnams// khyed rgyud las bdus gsang sngags dran pas sdig pa phrogs pa'i srung ma gzhon med byed par 'gyur// glang chen
49b1(rgyud 'grel): sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can myos byed chu bo'i rgyan dang ldan pas mun gtibs shing // mtshon cha 'od zer rnams ni glog rab 'gyu ltar rab gsal mda' yi char 'bab g.yul ngo 'gyed pa'i tshe// rnam par 
49b2(rgyud 'grel): sdang ba'i dgra bo dpung pa'i stobs ni rab mchog ldan pa rnams kyis bkag gyur pa// khyod kyis dgra po gsod pa'i dpa' bo gcig gis 'phral du dgra yi sa gzhi phye mar rlog/ sdig spyod dag gis 
49b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'brel po la mig tshabs can dag las rnag khrag rul pa rab 'dzag cing // sha lpags myags pa la chags rtsa sgo'i bu gar 'gul ba'i srog chags kyis zos lus zad rnams/ 
49b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod zhabs nye bar brten pa'i sman mchog ri lu goms par byed la gus shing chags pa yis// sa le sbram dang mtshungs pa'i lus dang pad mo dkar po ltar yangs mig dang ldan par 
49b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i snod na tha ma rnams kyis gnang ba'i man ngag slongs mo mi gnas shing // zos pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas pa'i tshogs rnams dag tu lpags pa nyid du khas len gang / 
49b6(rgyud 'grel): de yang khyed la gus pa'i nus pas rgyan rnams thams cad mdzes byed 'byor par bcas pa yi// ngag gi dbang phyug thob nas mi bdag 'dun sar rgol ba'i seng ge'i khri dag 'phrog par byed// 
49b7(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi mal stan rdul gyi lus bsgos skyed ngos ras ral yan lag dag ni rnam par mngon// shig gis tshe dag rab gtsor gzhan gyis grong khyer mdun du gyo mor zas ni don gnyer ba/ 
49b8(rgyud 'grel): khyod brnyes bgyid la brtson pas na chung mchog gis bzung ba'i rnga yab 'dzum gyis rab mdzes shing // myos pas long ba'i gnyis mazung sos gtams gdugs gcig gyen du btegs pa'i 
50a1(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi 'dzin par 'gyur// g.yog dang las mtha' bzo dang dbang po gso ba'i thabs kyi rnam grangs dag gis rab sngo zhing // skye ba snga mar rab bsgrubs bsod nams bsags pa'i dge 
50a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras nor ni thob par ma chur pa'i// nor med rnams kyis skye bo bkren pa'i yum grur phongs las 'da' bar mdzad pa khyod las don// don du gnyer na slar yang gser gyi tshogs kyi gter dag 
50a3(rgyud 'grel): sa las 'thon pa thob par 'gyur// 'tsho ba chad las ngo tshar gyur cing gos zad chung ma dag gis rab tu spyod par byed// bdag nyid gso phyir rang gi skye bo bu dang grogs po gnyen gyis ring du
50a4(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa yis// khyed la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas rang gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil sgras// gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhing rta rmig rtse mos mtshams bsgos khang khyim 
50a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi bdag po byed// 'khor lo phyogs kyi 'khor lo la sbyor bud med mtshan brgyan 'od gzer g.yo zhing che ba dang // glang chen gtso bo mche ba drug ldan rta mchog spu kha sngo sangs rma bya'i mgrin 
50a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'tsher// nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar gsal dri med yon tan mdzod 'dzin mdzod khengs dang // dmag dpon dpal ste ldan par bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi bka' drin cha shas phra las 'gyur/ 
50a7(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo la mdzes mas dus btab rtse dga' la chags pas// sbu gu ma yi bde ba'i nyer spyad mgron du bya ba mngon par gsal ba rab bsgrubs shing // ral gri 'od zer gyis sngo 
50a8(rgyud 'grel): sbom mtho dpung pa gtun shing dang 'dra dpung rgyan rol pa can// khyod kyi rigs drug rig 'dzin dbang po ma la ya yi me tog tshal du rang dgar 'gro// nu ma'i zon 'khor do shal gyis brgyan mig 
50b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyus ring po rna ba'i ut+pal la 'gran cing // lhas mo yid 'ong man+dA ra ba dang ldan ze 'brugasar pa'i dris myos bung ba can// dril chung sgra yis rjes 'brel rab tu gsal bar rkang rngub yid 'ong sgra snyan rdzogs par 
50b2(rgyud 'grel): byed// 'dod pas myos dga' gzhon nu ma rnams gus dang bcas par khyed mgon ldan pa don du gnyer// rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pad ldan ze 'bru rdo rje phreng ba can// yongs 'du'i ljon 
50b3(rgyud 'grel): ba las 'phro dri bzangs dang ldan me tog rdul gyi tha ze mthor bres te// pi wang gling bu sgrogs mkhas lha yi grong gis dga' ma rnams kyis snyan par rab bsgrags pa'i// dga' ba'i skyed tshal bgrod pa khyod 
50b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bcing mas yun rings nyams su myong bar 'gyur// nang gi byed pa khyod la gtad pa'i bsod nams mthu ni rab 'bar yongs su smin pa yis// gapur e la li shi shun pa a ka ru dang na la dbye'i dri

50b8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal 'byor tha ze can// nyi ma 'char ka bye ba lta bur rab gsal 'od zer rgyas pas 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing // brtan par g.yas brkyang zhabs gcig gis mnan

51a4(rgyud 'grel): byung nam mkha'i khyon gnas sa dang sa 'og dag na gnas// mthor ris la gnas tshangs dbang drag po la sogs mi dang lha dang grub pa dri za klu// phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs

51a8(rgyud 'grel): su// kun rig nyid dam de yi sras kyis khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni mngon sum mkhyen// bdag 'dra gtor ma spyod pa sgrogs pa lta bur kha gdangs ku co che bar 'don pa gang // de ni mi bzad sdug bsngal

51b2(rgyud 'grel): rang sems tshim pa'i sgra// don shes zin yang mnyen 'dun byams pa'i mdun du sdug bsngal ldan pas tshig gis sdug bsngal ni// dug bzhin skyugs par gyur na snying yang song zhes byed cing rnam par

52a2(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor thal sbyar bkod pa bdag gis bsod gsar me tog phreng bas gus mchod bgyi// brgal bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal me nang lus lung skal ngan phyogs gang zhig la brten snyam pa// thun zhing ci ci brgya

54b1(rgyud 'grel): tshigs gzo yi spyod pa rnams// spong ba'i thabs kyis rnam grangs dag gis dub cing skye ba snga mar nyer blangs bsod nams kyis// nyer bsags dge 'bras nor ma thob dang nor bral rnams kyis 'phya las

54b5(rgyud 'grel): med mtshan brgyan 'og pag chen po g.yo dang glang chen don po mche ba drug pa dang // rta mchog s+tha ni kha dog sngo bsangs rma bya'i mgrin ltar 'tsher dang yon tan dri med nor bu ni// nyi ltar mdangs 
54b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'od can khyim bdag mdzod khengs blon po rtul pod dmag ldan 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod kyis rig pa'i grub pa thob pas tsan dan chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo steng du// sbu gu ma yis dus 'debs
54b7(rgyud 'grel): sdug pa dang rol rjes su chags pas bde ba'i nyer spyad gsar// gus par sbyar zhing lag sbom mthon po ral gri'i 'od zer sngon pos dpung rgyan g.yo ba yi// rig 'dzin dbang po rang dgar gyur te
54b8(rgyud 'grel): mA la ya yi me tog skyed mos tshal du 'gro// nu ma'i than kor do shal gyis mnan mig dgus ring pos rna ba'i ut+pal la 'gran zhing // sgra bskyil man+da ra bas brgyangs pas ze 'bru sar ba'i dri yis 
55a1(rgyud 'grel): myos pa'i bung ba dang ldan pa'i// lha yi bu mo rkang gdub rags pa'i sil snyan 'og bag sgra yi rgyun gyi shin tu dpangs// bskyed cing 'dod dran dregs dga' khyod mgon ldan pa dag la gus
55a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas gsol ba 'debs// rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pad mtsho ze 'bru rdo rje'i tshogs ldan zhing // yongs 'du'i ljon shing skye zhing me tog ze 'bru dri zhim rdul gyi bla re mthor 
55a3(rgyud 'grel): bres te// lha yi grong khyer rangs bgyid lha mo bi wang gling bu sgrogs pa mkhas pas sil snyan ni// snyan par bsgrags pa'i dga' tshal lha mo khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas yun rings myong bar

55a5(rgyud 'grel): med sdug gu'i num 'dod pa'i dregs pas 'bur ba'i skyibs 'khyil ba// dal 'bab gad+hA'i chu la chu rtsed chu ni drag tu 'thor bas rtsed mo byed par 'gyur// khyod kyi spyan ras mang du phog pas dag pa'i bka' la 
55a6(rgyud 'grel): lhagatso dul ba'i khur bu yis// cod pan 'dud pa rnams kyis phyag byas mtho ris steng na lha yi glang chen thal gong ni// khrol khrol rgyan gyis sdud pa la zhon lus kyis ba spu shas cher langs pa'i bde
55a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs sogs// lag ring 'od li bar me bskyil cing chad pa rdo rje dang 'brel lha yi yul las skyong // khyod sku gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyis gdan bzhugs bde bar gshegs 'od mkha' khyab bla re can// 
55a8(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma shar ka bye ba lta bur ches gsal 'od zer dag gis 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing // zhabs gcig g.yas brkyang gom stabs chen po'i brjid la tshangs dbang khyab 'jug drag po rnams 'dud 
55b1(rgyud 'grel): pa// bsgoms pas sde ba la brten rnams kyi srid pa'i 'jigs pa rgun ni gcod par bgyid par 'gyur// lal khro ba dang bcas phyag tshogs phyag cha rnams kyi 'od zer dag dang 'brel ba yis// nam mkha'i khongs 
55b2(rgyud 'grel): khyab sbrul gyi gdub bu'i gdengs ka dag gis spyod pa mi 'brog mi bzang ba'i// sdang rnams sbag mdzad gang mo'i cang te'u drag po brdungs pas rlang bskyed tshe na ro langs ni// thal mo'i sgra chen spogs pas bsgyings// 
55b3(rgyud 'grel): shing bsnyems pa'i rol pa chen po'i ca co drag par khums// la las pa spu'i khung re nas byung nam mkha' khyab pa'i sar gnas sa 'og mtho ris gnas// tshang pa dbang po la sogs lha dang klu dang dri za mi dang grub 
55b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams gnas shing // phyog tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mtha' yas kyis bkra dang // ngo mtshar khams gsum phyag 'os brtan dang g.yo bar gnas pa'i 
55b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos po ma lus ngo bor khrums// la las rgya stegs li khri'i tshon 'dra nyi ma gzhon nu ches dmar lta bur dmar bar khums// de bzhin gzhan gyi dpal ldan an+d+ri sAl dum bstags pa'i phye ba 'phrul 'drang sngon por

55b7(rgyud 'grel): tan tshogs kyi grangs ni kun mkhyen ye shes sgron mas rab tu gsal ba yi// shes bya mtha' dag de nyid dbang gcig thams cad mkhyen pa dngos dang de sras kyis mkhyen te// bdag 'dra bya rog sgrog ltar kha gdangs

56a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu byed pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka bar+m+ma dang // bod kyi lo tsa ba pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyi bskur ba las/ slad kyis paN+Di ta chen po ma Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas// phyag lo 
56a8(rgyud 'grel): tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis cung zad bcos te dag par byas so// // 'phags ma sgom ma'i matog zeng pa da zugs so// #// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra sra ga d+ha ra s+pho tra/ bod skad du/ 
56b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa sgrol ma'i me tog zeng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa// sngar shang nyi ma spang ba dmar// lha mchog spyi gtsug nor bu dmar// de 'byar kha dog de la ni// chos sar gyis ni bslus pa 'dra// 'phags ma khyed kyi zhabs gnyis 
56b2(rgyud 'grel): la// gus pa'i thal mo dbu rgyan gyis// de mdzes mgo yis phyag 'tshal lo// nyes byung dus su skyabs sam// de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no// bstod sar me tog phreng ba 'dis// mchod la bdag gis phyag 'tshal lo// 
56b3(rgyud 'grel): brgal mi nus pa'i sdug bsngal me// de la rtag tu lus lhung gnas// skal pa ma ldan 'gros gang // rmongs pa bdag gis ji ltar bya// de ltar rtag tu smras nas ni// don med bdag ni stobs chung song // mkha' 
56b4(rgyud 'grel): la nyi zla dpal ldan grags// de ni gzhan gyi sba ba thos// de thos long ba'i spyod pa ltar// mthong rten 'dod kyang gzhan khrid med// sdig pa 'joms ma khyed la ni// bdag ni skyabs mthong 'dod lags so// sems can

57a1(rgyud 'grel): don du bu slong na// de la ma yang skyo bar 'gyur// mi rnyed nyin re slong gyur na// pa yang bu la khro bar byed// 'jig rten gsum gyi brlangs kyang ni// khyed kyi 'bras bu gang bar byas// dpag bsam shing gi

59b7(rgyud 'grel): tshe sbrul du mthong // kye ma'o khros nas skrag par byed// rgod pa'i sgra ni shin tu 'jigs// ma rungs pa yi spyod pa byed// ro langs ting ting shag ni brdung // 'jigs chen rtsed mo sgra chen skrag/ kha cig

59b9(rgyud 'grel): sa sas la gas mams sa sa sa sa sa la sa ra bya bar sa gas sa bya sa pa sa bya bya sas bya bya byasas bya bya sa bya bya bya bya ga gsog sa sa thas mam sa gsas mams sas byas

60a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas pa// kye ma 'gul ni 'gal gnas pa// sna tshogs lha med dngos po ni// kye ma sgrol ma khyad yin no// kha cig gis ni mthong ba la// rgya skyugs dang ni sin dur// dkar dmar kha dog nyi ma ltar//

60a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mar me thams cad mkhyen// des ni thams cad gsal bar mthong // de nyid mkhyen pa dbang po gcig/ nges par khyod kyi yon tan ni// grangs las thams cad mkhyen pas shes// yang na de yis

60b1(rgyud 'grel): ni 'gro ba'i don// 'bras bu thob pa yod par mthong // rab tu bstod pa'i yon tan cha// bdag gis bsod nams bshad mi shes// bsod nabs de yi stobs kyis ni// 'jig rten pa kun don grub nas// grol ba'i

65a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs 'khrugs pa'i me chen rab tu bsil bar byed par shog/ me tog phreng 'dzin sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs 'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlab pa paN+Di ta chen po ta thA ga 
65a2(rgyud 'grel): tA rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // cog kru lo tsa ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bskur ba'o// // @#// stong pa nyid skom pa me tog zeng dzin bzugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shU n+ya tA b+ha bAn 
65a3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ stong pa nyid bsgom pa/ me tog phreng 'dzin sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// gtum mo e yi sbyor ba yis// lus kyi ba spu cher ldang zhing // yang dag lta ba goms gyur pa/ de nyid chos rnams 
65a4(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid brjod// de ltar sgrub pa'i thabs lan mang du goms par byas la bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bcu sngon du song ba'i gang zag gis ri yi phug la sogs pa dben pa'i gnas su stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i 
65a5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa la 'jug par bya ste/ de yang skad cig gis bdag gi snying kar paM las pad+ma a las zla ba'i steng du dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi yi ge sa tAM ku mu ta dkar po lta bu la kun nas bskor ba las 'od 
65a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byas te slar log pa tAM la thim par blta'o// de ma thag tu bdag nyid 'phags ma sgrol ma me tog phreng 'dzin zhes bya ba sku mdog dkar 
65a7(rgyud 'grel): mo ston ka'i sprin med pa'i zla ba lta bu lang tsho la bab pa'i cha lugs 'dzin pa// g.yas mchog sbyin pa g.yon pa ut+pal sngon po kha du mar gyes pa 'dzin pa// rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis sku mdzes 
65a8(rgyud 'grel): par byas pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du su brtson pas bzhugs pa la sems bsnyad de bsgom par bya'o// de nyid 'od kyi rnam pa las// rang rig rnam pa gzhan med de// g.yas dang g.yon gyi lam 
65b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dgag/ rang sems dbu ma'i lam du gzhug/ dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las// bsam gtan gyis ni phyi rol dngos po btang nas sems de brtan par yang ni byed// srog dang rtsol bas nyi zla 
65b2(rgyud 'grel): spangs nas mun pa can du srog rlung rgyu bar byed// 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig ler dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug dman par yang byas nas// rjes dran rang gi gzugs las mkha' la ri bong can bzhin
65b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer chen po 'byung // 'od kyi phung po srul thim// su yang pad+ma zla ba la// de nyid dbyangs dang gsal byed la// de yang yi ge tAM la bsdu// tA yang thig le nyid la thim// thig le stong pa'i yi ge med// de nyid
65b4(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi mtshan nyid do// rang sems 'dod nas ma skyes phyir// rtag sogs brtags pa ga la 'jug/ de nyid spros pas dbyen pa'i phyir// cung zad bsgoms kyang bdag gzhan gyi// rtog pa sna tshogs 'gag 
65b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// rgyun tu bsgoms pa smos ci dgos// de ltar de bzhin nyid la tho// mnyam par gzhag pa'i mthu chen gyis// yang dang yang du goms byas nas// myung du byang chub reg par 'gyur// stong pa nyid
