100a6(rgyud 'grel): bar gnas// srin po'i zhal ni gnas pa yi// rnam par 'gyur byed ma phyag 'tshal// sau raSh+Ta nye 'du ba// thor tshugs brla gnyis yang dag gnas// gser gling rje dang gnyis su ni// nye ba'i 'du ba gar mkhan ma'o// 
100a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal sku gsung thugs bdag la// rnal 'byor ma ni bcu gnyis dran// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin ma// 'khor lo rdo rje kun tu bsdams// thams cad mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin// spyan gsum spa rtse 'bar ba can// gar ma 
100a8(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo chen mo ni// bshad pa'i gsung gi 'od zer can// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// byed ni dmar la byed ni ldang // swa brdzes legs pa'i spyan mnga' ma// phyogs kyi gos can mchog 'dzin pa'o// phyag 'tshal/ 
100b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong ma rnams la// kaM pu dzi la sogs pa bzhi// zhal gcig spyan ni gsum ma'o// phyag bzhi ma ni mdzes ma ste// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na gnas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// bdud bzhi yi ni gdar la bzhugs// 
100b2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs mdog can phyogs kyi gos// rngam pa'i zhal can 'jigs pa'i gzugs// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod gnas// mgo bo'i phreng bas kun nas brgyan// thod pa kha r+tha
100b3(rgyud 'grel): ga 'dzin pa// gri thug mi yi mgo bo bsnams// rkang pa'i bol gol yul du ni// kaM bu dzi la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lha mo prak+ka si// rkang pa'i mthil ru kun nas bzhugs// si d+hu'i zhing du bzhugs pa ni// rna la 
100b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod// de bzhin ma ro'i yul song ba// phyag 'tshal rnal 'byor lto ba me// pus mo gnyis ka'i yul gnas pa'i// ma taM gi la phyag 'tshal bstod// ze 'bru'i dbus na bzhugs pa yi// 
100b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i 'dren pa rnal 'byor ma// thams cad 'byung ba'i nang na gnas// sgrol ma'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor lo bzhi yi ting 'dzin gnas// tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi ma// snying rje chen po yin 
100b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs// rang bzhin med la phyag 'tshal bstod// dang po'i yi ge man ga zhal// A li kA li la gnas gzhan// rom rkyang ma a bi na// gnyis su med la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag bsdus// snying 
100b7(rgyud 'grel): gi gnas las bzhengs pa yi// stong pa snying rje gnyis su med// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// bsam gtan thams cad zla byed spangs// dag bzhi po rnams rtogs pa yi// sra rtse brgya cha'i rnal 'byor 
100b8(rgyud 'grel): ma// mtshan nyid med la phyag 'tshal bstod// tog med mtshams med brten pa med// rtog med gnas pa med pa yi// thogs med yon tan ram mis legs// bud med rnam pa phyag 'tshal bsnyed// rnam par mi 
101a1(rgyud 'grel): brten pa med// bsam gtan bzlas brjod spangs pa yi// spangs pa nga rgyal med pa yi// rtog tu shar la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtog med bcom pa rnam bcom med// spang bya med cing gnas pa med// 
101a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med pa snang ba med// the tshom med la phyag 'tshal bstod// mchog tu zhi ba phra rags med// mchog dang bar dang tha ma spangs// kun nas ngo bo thams cad bzhugs// thams cad 'das ma phyag 'tshal bstod/ 
101a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sems kyi gzugs can ma// thams cad mchog tu yongs su ste// bgegs rnams rab tu zhi ba ma// bgegs med ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshad med longs spyod med pa la// sa 'og sa bla rnam
101a4(rgyud 'grel): par khyab// gnyis med 'chi med lha mo ni// mthong ba med la phyag 'tshal bstod// sngon nas spangs pa med pa 'dzin// gnyis su med dus gzi brjid can// tshad med kun nas rang gis rig/ ngo bo med la phyag 'tshal/ 
101a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod// grangs med pa yi mi bzad pa// shes mig 'jigs pa spangs pa'o// 'chi ba spangs pa'i dbang phyug mtha'// dga' ba lam phyag 'tshal bstod // bla ma'i drin gyis gdul bya bzhin// rnal 'byor ma mos spyod lam gyis// 
101a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun la pan don du// zhing gi rnal 'byor phyag 'tshal lo// mos pa chen pos rjes su chags// bstod pas bstod pa'i rkang pa 'di// sgra dang sgra med shes pa med// bzod pa mchog gi dbang 
101a7(rgyud 'grel): phyug ma// bdag ni byis pa rmongs pa ste// mos pas bstod pa shin tu dga'// zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i bstod pa 'di blon po'i rigs shin tu dga' ba'i paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta ye shes 
101a8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang // lo tsa ba nag tsho chen pos bsgyur ba'o// // #// de rdo rjel bu'i mtshan 'ad gas so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra g+haN+Da lak+Sha Na nA ma// bod skad du/ rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba// 
101b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i grub pa bshad par bya'o// de 'dzin pa la rtag brtan pa// sor bzhi dang bzhi dang bcu pa bcu gnyis pa dang bcu drug pa dang / brgyad pa dang / nyi shu'i tshad kyi gser gyi rdo rje saM sa'i gtso bo'i 
101b2(rgyud 'grel): rig pa 'dzin pa nyid dang / rtag tu rab tu bzang po thob bo// rgyal po rang gi rgyal po gong ma nyid zangs kyi rdo rje yis 'dod pa 'grub bo// rdo'i rdo rjes lha ma yin gyi dbang po kun dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyang bskyod pa'o// don 
101b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'grub par 'byung ba lcags kyis te/ lcags gcig gis dpal tshe nad med pa nor kun thob pa'o// gza' thams cad dang seng ldeng gis so// ma du ka'i shing gis gnod sbyin bsgrub po// des chos kyi don bsgrub po// 
101b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i shing gi sgra med par 'gyur ro// mi'i rus pa yis mi'i srog 'brog go// shel gyis thams cad dbang po'i gzhu ltar snang ngo // zhe sdang gi las la nim pa yis so// wa'i bru sha'i shing gis gsad pa dang skams pa dang // shaH 
101b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub rtag tu rab tu bzang ba'o// dri za gnod sbyin kun 'grub po// su ru tsan dan gyis so// sa yis gzugs gzhan du rnam par 'gyur ro// srin pos skye gnas 'grub bo// mya ngan med pa'i shing las byas pa'i rdo rjes nor 'phel lo// 
101b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'am dkar po tsan dan gyis gang 'dod pa rab tu thob bo// rtse lnga pa sran te shel gyis rtag tu bsrung ba rgyal ba'i zhabs zung bzlas pa byas na 'grub po// dri zhim pos mchod pas zhi ba'i sem dang ngag gang bzlas pa
101b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer bzung nas byas na 'grub po// sgrub pa pos sngags pas gzung ngo // ming med pa rdo rje bcang ba byas te sems rtse gcig pas so// rdo rje'i rgyu gang las byung ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu btus te phyag 'tshal nas shes rab ye 
101b8(rgyud 'grel): shes thib tu bri ba med pa'o// rdo rje mtshan nyid parjod nas dril bu'i mtshan nyid 'og nas 'byung bas shes so// gser gyis byas pa rtse lnga pa 'od bzang po cha gsum pa gzung ba'o// rtse mo bye ba rnams bye brag tu'o// dang po dril 
102a1(rgyud 'grel): bu gdong bshad pa ni// dpal gyi gdong dang / pad+ma'i gdong dang ba lang gi gdong log pa bsil ba'i dbyibs su'o// de lta bu'i dril bu phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ngo // dpal gyi gdong gis rgyas pa'i las/ 
102a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'grub po// pad+ma'i gdong ni pad+ma'i dbyibs su byas pa ste/ dbang gi las byed do// ba lang gi gdong du byas pa'i dril bus zhi ba'i las ster bar byed do// sor bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / sor bcu 
102a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pas shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi'o// rang 'byung gi shes rab kyi rnam pa ni dril bu'i khog pa chos 'byung ba'i dbyibs dran pa'o// ye shes ldan pa lnga'i thabs kyis rdo rje steng na gnas pa'o// chos
102a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gi nang du hriM gi yi ge las de bsgom par bya'o// dril bu de chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo// yi ge hUM la rdo rje ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dran par bya'o// de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad 
102a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas so// 'di skad 'byung ba'i dril bu de lus ngag yid gsum gyi rnam pa'o// khog pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i gnas dran pa'o// de'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma 
102a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa gsung rdo rje'o// de'i steng du bum pa'i bsam gtan te byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par gang ba'o// de'i steng du sems kyi rdo rje bsgom mo// pad+ma'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o// 
102a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rin po che/ pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje'o// lnga pa spyi bor yang dag par gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa rang gi rnam pa'o// sa gzhi khog pa'i rnam pa ni lha mo sangs rgyas spyan yang dag par gnas pa'o// chu'i rnam pa ni 
102a8(rgyud 'grel): mA ma kI bum pa yang dag gnas pa byas pa'o// me'i rnam pa ni gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin no// khong pa'i rlung gi rnam pa dbus su bltas pa sgrol ma'o// stong pa'i dbus na rdo rje lce g.yo ba'i gsung ngo // nam mkha'i 
102b1(rgyud 'grel): ni bum pa'i steng na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mgon po yang dag gnas pa'o// sa'i snying po dang 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan no// mtshan ma'i steng du phreng bas bskor ba ni gsum po de'i tshul gyis brjod
102b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// spre'u yi gdong ni byang chub sems dpa'i lnga'o// de'i gdong ni steng du rdo rje'i phreng ba'i rnam pa ni sgo skyong dang dpa' bo chen po khro bo bcu dran pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam pa'i dril bu shes rab kyi sgra'i rnam
102b3(rgyud 'grel): pade'i rdo rje sems dpa' snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o// tshes 'byung ba'i maN+Dal gyi zhing du gnas pa sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du gnas pa/ sku mdog dkar mo// bsgom mo// rdo rje dang dril
102b4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta pa ra he dngang / lo tsa ba nag tshe dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// med pa ma pa chag pazugs so/ #// rgya gar skad du/ ka pA la pU dza 
102b5(rgyud 'grel): bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ thod pa mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ zhing chen gyi rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo// lhung bzed chen po'i mchod pa'i cho ga'o// de nyid bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i snod dang / gzhan gnyis
102b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang bshams la/ rang rang gi tshe ga ltar byin gyis brlabs la/ de'i steng du mchod pa'i gnas la// rang gi yi dam lha gang yin pa'i gdan pad+ma dang / nyi ma 'am zla ba 'am bdud dam ro la sogs pa la/ 
102b7(rgyud 'grel): rang rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge las phyag mtshan sa bon gyis mtshan pa/ de las spros bsdus pas yongs su gyur pa las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'am/ lha brkyang pa bskyed la/ ye shes pa dgug pa 
102b8(rgyud 'grel): dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya'o// dbang bskur nas rigs kyis bdag pos rgyas gdab po// g.yon gyi la yi dam gyi lha gzhan bsgom// g.yas kyi la paM las pad+ma// raM las nyi ma'i steng du hUM/ 
103a1(rgyud 'grel): las sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la hUM gis mtshan pa da las spros bsdus pa las// bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngo// spyan 
103a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dmar ba// mche ba gtsigs pa/ dbus skra dang sma ra ser ba/ g.yas dang po na sna tshogs rdo rje/ gnyis pa 'khor lo// gsum pa na ral gri/ g.yon dang po na sdigs mdzub dang dril bu/ gnyis
103a3(rgyud 'grel): pa na zhags pa/ gsum pa na dgra sta/ zhabs g.yon bskum pa/ g.yas brkyang ba/ stag gi sham thabs can/ sbrul gyi sa brgyan pa/ me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa bsgom mo// de nas
103a4(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs pas mchod do// de nas bar chad zhi bar gsol ba gdab po// mthe bo dang srin lag sbyar bcug la/ oM AHhUM lan gsum bzlas pas bdud rtsir zhu bar bsgom mo// de nas 
103a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus ma'i maN+Dal la me tog la sogs pas mchod do// de nas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa'i rang gi lugs ltar bzla zhing dbul lo// yang lha gzhan gyi la me tog la sogs pas mchod pa dang / 
103a6(rgyud 'grel): yang bdud rtsi mchod do// de zhu bas yang dbus ma la mchod do// de ltar ma 'byor na yang ci 'byor pa'i snod gcig tu bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa/ lhung bzed la mchod do// de nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba

103a8(rgyud 'grel): ma rmi lam sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sprin bral mkha' dkyil zla rgyas gzugs// rab dkar bsil ba'i 'od ldan ma// ma lus rmi lam gsal mdzad de'i// zhabs la mgos btud de bsrub bshad/ 
103b1(rgyud 'grel): dge bas rab tu sngar langs te// gdong sogs dag byas dri zhim byug/ rje btsun de rten mdun bdar la// yid 'ong mchod pas mdzes par byas// skyabs gsum lha mor bcas pa la// skyabs gsum 'gro la phan yid
103b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis// mi dge med pa'i sems ldan pas// thog mar bsod nams tshogs bsags bya// oM a mri ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na sarba bag+h+nAn ta Ta ha ta Ta ha sarba bA paM hUM phaT swA hA// 'khyil pa khros pa'i sngags 'di yis//

103b4(rgyud 'grel): bsil ri bong 'dzin 'khyil de dbus khams gsum rgyas 'gengs tAM// kun nas mun sel skar ma'i rgyal po 'od bzang mdog can rab 'phros las// yongs gyur 'phags ma rmi lam sgrol ma zhi ma dge ma mdze
103b5(rgyud 'grel): ma blta// rab dkar lang tshe rgyas pa'i gzugs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mchog sbyin mdzad// ut+pal sngo 'dzin 'gying tshul sgeg/ mtshungs med gcig pos kun khyab ma'o// dri zhim dbu skra bzang 'khyil li// 
103b6(rgyud 'grel): lha rdzas rin chen du mas brgyan// mthing kha'i dar gyis stod g.yogs shing // sna tshogs kha dog sham thabs mnabs// mu tig phreng ba'i dra ba yis// mnyam par mdzes pa'i ska rags dang // ga sha se 
103b7(rgyud 'grel): ral khar bcings shing // cod pan ngon yod grub pas brgyan// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang skyil krung gis// srid dang zhi la mi gnas shing // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// spu sgo kun 
103b8(rgyud 'grel): nas rab 'phro ba'o// ci 'dra'i ye shes lha mo 'di// bkug la mchod pas mnyes byas bstim// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// byin brlabs phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bsngags// de nas maN+Dal mchod
104a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas// gus par phul la gsol ba gdab// zhal zas btung ba bzang ldan pa// dkar gsum mngar gsum me tog dbu la// rin chen phreng ba dkar thogs te// ma yengs blo yis 
104a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma la// rtse gcig yid bstad gsang sngags mchog/ 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir bzlas// oM swa b+hU ta re swA hA/ de nas zang zing med par ni// rang gzhan don du rmi ltas brtag/ grong pa'i chos 
104a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ma sbags pa'i// bu mo dus bzang dag la mchod// dri zhim khrus byas gos brgyan mdzes// rang lo'i grangs sam brgyad dam bdun// ar+g+ha la sogs mchod sngon 'gros// zas dkar zho dang 'o ma sbyin/ 
104a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gran bu dang sogs yon byin la// dung chos chus gtor ci bder dengs// de rjes byi dor dri ra ldan pa'i// khang par tshangs spyod brdul zhugs gnas// sngas su me tog dri zhim gyis// byugs pa'i maN+Dal
104a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang byas la// mchod pa lnga dang khyad par du// gu gul mar me dbul bar bya// 'jim ril sran ma'i tshad bcos te// kuN+Da li yi sngags bdun gyis// btab la nyi shu rtsa gcig ni// phyogs bcur 
104a6(rgyud 'grel): gtor bas bar chad zlog/ gsum bdun gcig ni rin po cher// bsgoms pas maN+Dal steng du dbul// stan la dgram dang gzung bar bya// de rjes gang 'dod gsol ba tab nyal// oM swab+da tA ra swabA/ 
104a7(rgyud 'grel): a ba lo ki ni// trai lo kya ni daR+sha nI/ trai lo kya bi dzA ra ni/ b+hu taM b+ha paM b+ha ba si sham/ shu b+ha shu b+ha taM mi sa t+ye ka tha ya swA hA// brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu gcig/ yang na lan bdun bzlas par bya// gsol btag/ 
104a8(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis yid ches pas// lan cig bzlas kyang mi 'grub med// de tshe 'phags ma bdun gyi mkha' las phyogs bcur 'od mdzad thugs ka las byung ba sil zer gyis// bdag snying gdung 
104b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal zab thib dra ba ma lus spangs te sprin med mkha' ltar dag byas nas// glang chen sna 'dra'i phyag mdzes ring brkyang bdud rtsi can las bdud rtsi'i rgyun phab snying sogs bkang // de mthus lus kun kun nas dri 
104b2(rgyud 'grel): med shel bum mchog ltar gtsang zhing rab dag yid 'ong 'gyur// de 'og rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad// lha mo mchog la rtse gcig tu// ma g.yengs sems kyi dal bus ni// ji srid gnyid log bar du bzlas// 
104b3(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i nyal stabs dge bas nyal// bag yod dran dang ma bral ba// dngos sam brda'am tshig dag gis// dge dang mi dge mthong bar 'gyur// thub pas sna tshogs las grub kyis// rgyud du gang gsungs 
104b4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo che'i// brtag pa don kun sgrub byed 'di// rmi lam sgrol mas yang dag bshad// rmi lam sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon zla ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta 
104b5(rgyud 'grel): su ga ta shI dang / lo tsa ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// // rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// nam zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i tshe// bltos pa thams cad rab spangs te// ci 'byor mchod 
104b6(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon du bya// byang chub sems ni brtan par bsgom// 'byung bzhi thib pa lha bzhir bsgom// rnam shes thim pa yid kyi lnga// 'od gsal la thim 'od gsal te// bskyed rim thim pa rdzogs rim bsgom// 
104b7(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi shed nyams smig rgyu snang // snying gar bla ma bsgom par bya// sgo dgu skams nas du ba 'byung // lte bar rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom// drod btul srin bu me khyer 'dra// gsang bar don yod 
104b8(rgyud 'grel): grub pa bsgom// dbugs chad dmar me 'bar ba mthong // smin mtshams rta mgrin bsgom par bya// srog bral nam mkha' 'dra ba la// thams cad 'dus pa lhag pa'i lha// de rjes ma bcos 'gro 
105a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od med// rang gi ji ltar bzod ltar bsgom// mthar ni pha ma'i sa bon gnyis// dkar dmar thig le nyi zlar gyur// kha sbyar dbus su rang gi sems// srog gi sa bon taM yig blta/ 
105a2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// 'phags tshogs mchod cing 'gro don byas// bcu gnyis mdzad pa mthar phyung ste// gang 'dod zhing du 'tshang rgya'o// gson tshe srog rtsol la brten nas// thim pa 
105a3(rgyud 'grel): bdun ni rim bzhin bsgom// 'chi kar dngos su thim 'gyur bas// ma brjed tsam gyis 'grub par bzhed// rje btsun Ar+ya tA ra'i man ngag la brten nas 'chi ka'i ma'i nyams len// dpal chos

105a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la sogs pa spyan drangs te// bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can du bsams nas/ yid las byung ba'i mchod pas mchod de// me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas/ 
105a8(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i yan lag bdun rgyas par bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// sdig pa ma lus so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung / 
105b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// byang chub bar du bdag skyabs mchi// rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub phyir// byang chub sems ni bdag gis gzung // byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing // 
105b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer// byang chub spyod pa yid 'ong spyad par bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ zhes brjod cing de dag gi don dran par bya'o// de nas

105b5(rgyud 'grel): yang sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la tAM sngon por langs la/ de yongs su gyur pa las ut+pa la ljang gur blta zhing / de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros tshur 'dus pa yongs su gyur pa

105b8(rgyud 'grel): kyis snying ga'i pad+ma la tAM ljang gu 'od zer 'bar bas don thams cad mngon par bsgrubs nas/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o// bsnyen pa ni 'bum phrag bcus 'grub par 
106a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// rigs pa dang yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad sdud par byed do// sgyu ma lta bu'i blos nam mkha' lta bur bsgom pa ni rim pa bzhin no// de las byung ba'i dge bas yongs su bsngos nas 
106a2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i spyod pas gnas par bya'o// rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// @#// lagapa 
106a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ AHtA ra sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ 'bigs ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// thog mar phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i yan lag

106a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad stong pa nyid du mos par byas te/ de'i ngang las paM las pad+ma dang / a las zla ba'i steng du yi ge te ljang dgu yongs su gyur pa dang / ut+pa la tAM gis mtshan pa las/ 'phags ma sgrol ma
106a6(rgyud 'grel): su mdog ljang gu/ zhal gcig/ phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin dang / g.yon pa ut+pa la'i sdong bu 'dzin pa/ zhabs byed krung gis gnas pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes pa/ me long dang ba'i 
106a7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan lta bur bsgom par bya'o// de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du chen gang gi sku tshad dang ldan pa'i sgrol ma/ de'i thugs kar ut+pa la'i steng na sa bon gyi yi ges mtshan pa bsam par bya'o// de'i
106a8(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis 'og min nas ye shes sems dpa' bkug la mchod pa bya zhing / dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dgug pa dang / gzug pa dang / bcing ba dang / mnyes par bya'o// de nas spyi bo dang / mgrin pa dang / snying 
106b1(rgyud 'grel): garnams su oM AHhUM zhes pa'i yi ge gsum po dkar po dang dmar po dang mthing nag gi kha dog can gyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas yi ge tAM gi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 
106b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs pa la mchod pa dbul ba dang / dbang bskur ba bya ste/ oM AHsarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi she ka sa ma ya shrI ye hUM zhes brjod pas de dag 
106b3(rgyud 'grel): gis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun phab pa dang / bdag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yongs su tshim par 'gyur te/ bdud rtsi de'i rgyun phyi ma las grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa spyi bo'i steng du bsam par bya'o// 
106b4(rgyud 'grel): ya tAM de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros te/ sems can thams cad la bogs pas sgrol ma'i sku ru gyur nas slar de nyid la 'dus par bsam mo// de ltar yang dang yang du spro bsu byas te/ de la skyo bar gyur na oM tA re 
106b5(rgyud 'grel): trut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya bas sngags bzlas par bya'o// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shId+ha dra'i zhal snga nas byung ba rdzogs so// @#// dong can ma thamam la btsud pa dang / 
106b6(rgyud 'grel): ma kyi sa/ #// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bA ra hi tA ra sto \u0f7f/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phag mo sgrol ma la bstod pa/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// stong nyid snying rje pag mo che/ 
106b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// skabs ma brjod med pha rol byin// sgrol ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// dri med ye shes zla ba'i thugs// sgrol mi thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// zla 'od srid pa'i mun sel ba/ 
106b8(rgyud 'grel): 'joms byed nyi ma'i dkyil dang mtshungs// thabs dang shes rab yon tan ldan// sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud// 'grol bu bzhin rtag tu gdungs// srid gsum rnam thar gsum la 'god// seng ldeng nags la 
107a1(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas shing // 'jigs pa brgyad las shin tu skyob// sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal lo// mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams su// rdo rje mkha' 'gro skur ston cing // sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal 
107a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod// dpal dang ldan pa'i zhing khams su// rin chen 'kha' 'gror srung ston cing // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad sel mdzad// sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams su// pad+ma mtha'/ 
107a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gror skur ston cing // bde ba chen pa'i ngang la gnas// sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams su// las kyi mkha' 'gror skur ston cing // phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad// 
107a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod// mtha' dbus med pa'i zhing khams su// pha rol phyan ma'i skur ston cing // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshogs dang bcas// sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod// dur khrod brgyad 
107a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhing khams su// rdo rje phag mor srung ston cing // me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs// sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod// paN+Di ta zla ba grags pas bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so// #6// rgyag 
107a6(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ uSh+Ta ra sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol mkhro mo la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bstod pa/ jo mo byid rlabs can la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal ral pa gcig 'chang zo mo ni// me ro dmar po'i steng na 
107a7(rgyud 'grel): brkyang sum bzhugs// rgyas pa'i lha mo stag dang sbrul gyis brgyan// shin tu khros pas gad brgyangs cher sgrogs pa// g.yas pas ral gri mthing gser rtse la me 'bar zhing // 'og ma gcod byed gri gug rab tu 
107a8(rgyud 'grel): 'phyar// g.yon gyi dang po ut+pal rab rgyas shing // 'og mthod pa sra bcas rak+tas bkang // ral pa'i thor cog dbu la rab tu mdzes// spyan gsums gsum gzigs dri med tshal/ mgo bo'i thod phreng 
107b1(rgyud 'grel): skam rlon spel mas mdzes// de lta'i gzugs ni gzhan min bdag nyid do// dpal ral pa gcig ma'i rtsa ba'i sngags don 'gyur du bsgyur ba'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa rkang pa bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// 
107b2(rgyud 'grel): / lha mo u bang+gA ra'i srub thabs bzhugs so// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ u gra tA ra de wI sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ lha mo u gra tA ra'i sgrub thabs/ shes rab gsal byed u gra tA ra la phyag 'tshal lo// 
107b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid kyi bsgrub pa nyams su len par 'dod pa'i gang zag gis// gnas kyi khyad par// ling ga gcig pa'o// dur khrod dam/ khang stong la sogs pa'i gnas su// ro ma nyams pa'i// bde ba'i stan 
107b4(rgyud 'grel): la 'dug nas// gnas gsum rdo rje gsum bsam par bya zhing // yi ge gsum las 'od zer 'phros// srid pa gsum po thams cad snang bar byas// slar tshur 'dus nas thim par bsam mo// de nas 
107b5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi don bsam zhing // oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA wa shud+d+ho haM// zhes brjod do// de nas stong pa'i ngang las nam mkha'i gnas su// aHyig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las// pad+ma 
107b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po// de'i steng du/ taM yig yongs su gyur pa las ka pA la mtshan dang ldan pa'o// de'i steng du hUM yig sngon po yongs su gyur pa las// gri gug sngon po hUM gis mtshan pa'o// de yongs su gyur pa 
107b7(rgyud 'grel): las// rang nyid rje btsun ma u gra tA ra nyid du gyur pa ni// sku mdog sngon mo// 'jigs su rung ma/ mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba/ sku lus sbom thung / 
107b8(rgyud 'grel): gsus khyim che ga/ ut+pa la'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ zhal gcig ma/ lha'i gzugs can ma/ gzhad pa'i gdargyangs can/ dgyes par mdzad ma/ ro'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ klu chen po brgyad kyis nye bar 
108a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ lang tshe gzhon sha dang ldan pa/ phyag rgya lnga yis yang dag par brgyan pa/ ljags 'dril ba/ mche ba drag tug cig/ 
108a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang / zod pa thugs kar 'dzin cing / 'og ma gnyis kyis ral gri dang / ut+pa la 'dzin pa/ dmar ser dang ldan pa'i ral pa gcig ma/ ral pa'i khrod na rigs kyi bdag 
108a3(rgyud 'grel): po mi bskyod pa sa dbu brgyan par gyur pa'i lha mo skur bsam par bya'o// de ltar lha mo'i skur bsgom pa nyams su blangs pa nyid kyis sgrub pa po ni snyan dang gas mkhan chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bzlas 
108a4(rgyud 'grel): pa bya ste/ rbe shrI hUM phaT/ ces pa snying ga'i gnas su 'od zer rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa bsams nas/ yi ge rnams kyi 'od zer lnga yis mi shes pa'i bud shing bsregs shing / ye shes kyi snang ba bskyed 
108a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam mo// g.yas ral gri'i gnas su mi rus kyi phreng ba 'chang bar mo sa la bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar 'di'i sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gsung gi dbang phyug thob 
108a6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ro// 'od zer spro baspu'i sbyor ba nyid kyis yid rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag la sgom zhing / rang nyid snyan ngag mkhan chen po rig pa'i gnas lnga pa chen po'i paN+Di ta yin snyan du nga rgyal bya'o// 
108a7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bsgom pa la rtse gcig tu gnas pa nyid kyis/ the tshom med par snyan dngags mkhan chen po dang / gnas lnga pa'i paN+Di ta chen por 'gyur ro// gtor ma gtong bar 'dod na// gtor ma bsangs/ sbyangs nas/ 
108a8(rgyud 'grel): AHlas byung ba'i thod par oM AHhUM/ las byung ba'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bsams la/ sngags 'di nyid kyis gtor ma dbul lo// oM hrIHe ka dza Te/ ma ma u pa nI tA ya/ sarba satwAn+taM/ shAn+ti ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ 
108b1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ta k+Sha ka/ nA gA d+hi ba ta ye/ i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA ba ya greh+NA ba ya ba ra bi d+hA kaR+Sha ya kaR+Sha ya/ tra Ta tra Ta/ ts+tshe dats+tshe da/ ts+tshe da yats+tshe da ya/ oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa lan gsum maM bdun gyis so// mchod pas 
108b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas hUM gi yi ge las zung sngo zhing / sbom thung ral pa'i thor tshugs ldan// g.yon brkyang mchog gis mi ro mnan cing // mi zad mchog gi gang rgyangs can// ral gri ut+pa la dang ni gri gug thod 'dzin gru chen brgyan 
108b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan// 'gro ba'i mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad sgrol ma drag mo khyod la 'dud/ ces pas bstod do// gal te dngos dang rmi lam la sogs par 'brang po dang // sha za 'jigs su rung ba dang / bud med shin tu ring 
108b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / sbrul la sogs pas 'tshe ba dang / yid mi phebs pa dang / bsgrub snying mi 'dod pa rnams byung na gegs yin pas/ 'di'i gtor sngags kyis gtor ma btang zhing // rje btsun lha mo'i rnal 
108b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor la yid brtan pas/ thams cad stong pa nyid du bsam zhing // nyam nga ba dang / bag tsha ba nyid bu mi bya'o// de dag thams cad rang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bsgrub pa po yid spro ba dang / sems 
108b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ba dang / bsgrub pa la blo brtan pa dang / rmi lam du ma dang / sring mo dang / rje mo la sogs pa'i bud med rgyun gyis brgyan pa dang // lus sbom zhing brjid pa dang / dri dang ldang ba la sogs pa'i 
108b7(rgyud 'grel): bud med kyi tshogs kyis phyag mtshan po ti la sogs pa ster ba dang / rang gis rnyed pa dang / nyi zla shar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni grub pa'i rtags so// rjes su yi ge brgya pas nongs pa bshags 
108b8(rgyud 'grel): shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// lha mo'i nga rgyal la gnas pas spyod lam thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// lha mo u gra ta ra'i sgrub
109a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI ba na rat+na'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta de nyid dang chos 'khor lo tsa ba 'jam dpal ye shes zhes bya bas dpal 'khor bde chen du
109a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// @#/ rgol ma sa pa wA ra'i thub thabs rtag pa'i da rjes mdzad pa dgrags so// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya u gra tA ra sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma drag 
109a3(rgyud 'grel): mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol ma srid pa gsum sgrol u gra tA ra la btud de// tha ma'i man ngag ji bzhin de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod// ling ga 
109a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig dang de bzhin dur khrod yang na khang pa stong par ni// gnas der srid gsum grol ba'i rig ma rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub// 'jam par gyur pa'i byis pa'i ro 'am yang na 'jam pa yi// stan la sogs 
109a5(rgyud 'grel): la mnyam gnas dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// thog mar kha ga dong dag par rab byas gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ mdun gyi nam mkhar bla ma mchod la sdig pa bshags pa dang // rjes su yi rang 
109a6(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams yongs bsngol ma ni rab tu bsten// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rjes su dran pas byang chub sems ni bskyed// skad cig rnam pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje gsum ni bde mnyam bzhag/ de ni gnas gsum 
109a7(rgyud 'grel): bsam bya de las 'od zer rab 'phros nas// srid gsum spyod pa'i sems can gsal bar mdzad nas slar yang ni// khams gsum mtha' dag bsdus nas stong pa nyid du bsam par bya// de nas 
109a8(rgyud 'grel): shU n+ya tra sogs rang bzhin rgyal ba'i gsang sngags brjod// de nas nam mkhar a yig las byung chu skyes dmar po bsam// slar yang de steng taM yig las ni pad+ma'i snod bsam bya// de dbus hUM
109b1(rgyud 'grel): yig mthon mthing dag dang mtshungs pa bsams nas ni// hUM yig de las skyes pa'i gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan blta// gri gug yongs gyur bdag nyid sgrol ma mtshungs par bsgom pa ni// g.yon brkyang zhabs can
109b2(rgyud 'grel): mi bzad mgo bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang // chu skyes sngon pos rnam par brgyan cing thung zhing lto 'phyang 'jigs byed ma// bzang po zhal gcig spyan gsum gad rgyangs 'od dang ldan// rab tu dgyes shing ro / 
109b3(rgyud 'grel): mnan gru brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan// dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan can stag gi lpags pa rked la bsnams// lang tsho gzhon zhing phun tshogs phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// ljags ni rab 'khyug 
109b4(rgyud 'grel): mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs chen 'jigs byed ma// phyag g.yas ral gri gri gug g.yon na ut+pal thod pa bsnams// ral gcig dmar ser gyen brdzes mi bskyod ma yis dbu brgyan ma// bsgoms 
109b5(rgyud 'grel): bas stobs ni rab rdzogs rnal 'byor snyan dngags chen por 'gyur// gal te blun mongs gyur kyang sgom pa'i ro la 'bad byed na// bzlas pa 'bum phrag gcig gis 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid 
109b6(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur// snying gar yig gsum sngags chen rab bkod phaT yig mtha' ru'o// yang dag 'od zer lnga ldan mi shes bud shing rab tu bsreg/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rjes 'brang de nyid btu ba'i 
109b7(rgyud 'grel): cho ga brjod// dang por sa yi pha rol dbyangs yig bzhi pas rnam brgyan cing // ra yig zhon zhing 'ong 'phro zla ba thig le yang dag ldan// de bzhin bzhi pas ta yig brgyan te rnam par yang dag 
109b8(rgyud 'grel): sbyin// slar yang haM yig las sbyor yang dag u yig ring por ldan// phaT yig de nas sbyin zhing yongs rdzogs sgrub pa'i sngags nyid do// ral gri'i gnas su mkhas pas mi mgo'i phreng ba 
110a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsam// yang dag sngags mchog bzla zhing spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// brtan pa'i sems kyis brtag byas bdag nyid mkhas shing snyan dngags che// rab tu bsgom la goms pas de nyid the tshom med par 'grub// 
110a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi yi ge las zung sngon zhing sbom thung ral pa'i thor tshugs ldan// g.yon brkyang mchog gis mi ro mnan cing mi zad mchog gi gad brgyangs can// ral gri ut+pal gri gug thod pa 'dzin cing kru chen rgyan dang ldan// 
110a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad sgrol ma drag mo khyod la 'dud// sgrol ma'i sgrub zabs rab byas dge ba bdag gis gang bsags pa// de yis 'gro ba ma lus rgyal ba'i bstan la mkhas par shog 
110a4(rgyud 'grel): de 'dir rtag pa'i de rjes tho 'phel srub thabs byas pa yi// zab mo la ni mkhas pa rnams kyis 'di la bzod pa mdzad rigs so// 'phags ma sgrol madrag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba// slob dpon rtag pa'i rdorjes 
110a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI bA na rat+na'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsa ba many+dzu shris slad nas bskur ba dge'o bkra shis phun sum tshogs// @#// ra ga ga ma'i thu bas ga / 
110a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ e ka dzI Ti sran nAM/ bod skad nga/ ral gcig ma'i sgrib thabs/ ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis ro yi snying dang rkang mnan khro bo'i 
110a7(rgyud 'grel): gad mos bsdigs mchog ma// ral gcig ut+pal gri gug thod pa g.yas g.yon phyag ldan hU~M yig sa bon las byung mchog/ mi zung zod mo ral pa kham pa rgyas pa'i zor cog drag mo kru yis rab brgyan 
110a8(rgyud 'grel): ma/ 'gro ba gsum gyi mun pa la gzhag ro yi gdan// sgrol ma drag mo rang gi bsod par shog/ can nag las byung srid pa gsum// sgrol byed sgrol ma la bcad de// tha ma rnams kyi man ngag bzhin/ 
110b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod// mtshan ma gcig gam dur khrod dam// dus kun du ni khang stong du// rab tu mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// srid pa mthar phyin rig ma sbub// bu chung ro 'jam la gnas sam/ 
110b2(rgyud 'grel): yang na gdan 'jam 'bol ba la// kun tu gnas te rnal 'byor pas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor pas// yang dag rnal 'byor la 'dug nas// gnas gsu 
110b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsum bsgoms la// de nas 'od zer 'gro bar bya// srid gsum spyod pa'i sems can rnams// gsal bar byas la tshur dgug cing // bsdus rjes yang ni bsgom par bya// sna tshogs 
110b4(rgyud 'grel): kun las stong pa nyid// de nas rgyal ba'i sngags brjod de// stong nyid bsgom zhing de ngang las// a las mtsho skyes dmar po blta// de yi steng bu yang bsgom pa// b+hU yig las byung pad+ma'i snod// 
110b5(rgyud 'grel): yi dbus su yang ni bsgom// hUM mdzad yi ge sngon po ste// de nas hUM mdzad las skyes pa'i// gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan pa// gri gug yongs su gyur pa las// bdag nyid sgrol ma rab tu 
110b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang 'jigs su rung // mgo ya~M phreng ba 'phyang ba mo// mi'u zung 'jigs byed gsus pa sbom// sngon mo mtsho skyes kyis brgyan ma// zhal gcig spyan gsum 
110b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan ma ni// khro bzhad sdigs byed shin tu gsal// kun nas dga' byed ro la gnas// klu brgyad rnam par brgyan pa ste// spyan rtsa dmar zhing zlum pa'o// sku smad stag gis pags pa g.yogs/ 
110b8(rgyud 'grel): lang tsho dang bab phun tshogs ma// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// zhal nas ljags 'brel 'jigs ldan ma// mche bo gtsigs shing g.yon du gzigs// g.yas pas ral gri gri gug 'dzin/ 
111a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas ut+pal thod pa 'dzin// dbu skra kham pa drag pos brgyan// spyi gtsug mi bskyod rnam par brgyan// sgom gyi stobs kyis rdzogs pa na// rnal 'byor mkhas pa chen por 'gyur/ 
111a2(rgyud 'grel): gal ge rmongs pa bems po yang // sgom gyi ro la dbang gyur nas// 'bum phrag sngags ni bzlas pa yis// 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mtshungs par 'gyur// sngags chen 'di ni yi ge gsum// phaT yig
111a3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' can snying la gnas// 'od zer lnga dang yang dag ldan// mi shes bud shing sreg byed pa// rnal 'byor spyod pas rjes 'brangs nas// de yis bsdu ba'i cho ga brjod// dang po sa yi phyi ma gzung // dbyangs kyi yi 
111a4(rgyud 'grel): ge bzhi pas brgyan// gsal zhing 'bar ba ra la zhon// zla tshes thig les rnam par brgyan// de nas taM yig sbyin par byas// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// haM yig dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan/ 
111a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nyid du sbyin par bya'o// de nas phaT yig sbyin par bya// grub pa'am sngags ni yongs su rdzogs// mkhas pas ral gri stod sa ru// mi rus phreng ba bsgom par bya// spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// 
111a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags mchog yang dag bzlas pa bya// brtan pa'i sems kyis bsam par bya// baN+Di ta bdag snyan ngag mkhan// sgom stobs rgyun ni ma chad na/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ 
111a7(rgyud 'grel): byas pa yis// bdag gi bsod nams gang bsags des// rgyal ba'i bstan par skye bo rnams// snyan ngag mkhan du 'gyur bar shog/ 'di ni blo gros rab bsgrub ma// rtag pa'i rdo rjes byas pa yin// 
111a8(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa chen po baN+Di tas// 'di la shin tu bzod par 'os// rgya nag las ni byung ba yi// sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs yongs su rdzogs// / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las 'on 'da'i su grong 
111b1(rgyud 'grel): du lha'i skad las bod kyi brda' la 'khrul pa med par bsgyur ba'o// // lha mo ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol ma khro mo'i ba ling gi gtor ma la sngags 'dis lan gsum mam// bdun gyis 
111b2(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya ste// sngags ni 'di yin no// oM trAHe ka dzA Ti sa mo ya/ na bA nas ha na sA g+h+ri ku ru puSh+Ti ku ru ma he da DA ka nA gA rI pa ta yaM/ i maM ba l-I gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gr-ih+NA pa ya/ gr-ih+NA ba ya/ ba ra 
111b3(rgyud 'grel): mi r+ya kra sa bru Ta bru Ta/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ bin+da bin+da/ oM AHhUM phaT swA hA zhes pas phul la/ de nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma la bdag gis don la gsol ba gdab// rjes mi dmigs pas rgyas gdab// dge ba'i 
111b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo// sgrol ma khros po'i ba ling gi gtor ma rdzogs so// // rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dA nA shI las/ 'gren gyi khyad sar du rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// 'phags 
111b5(rgyud 'grel): ma sgrol ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma// ba ling gtor ma phul ba bzhes nas su// 'gro rnams ma lus mun pa bsal nas su// shes rab blo yi pad+ma kha 'byed shog/ dmar mo rab 'jigs nam mkha'i mdog/ 
111b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi stang stabs mdzes// mi shes yid 'joms la btud de// gzhung don bsgom rim 'di gsal bya// dang po kho nar rig pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis// dur khrod dam phyi nang gi rten/ 
111b7(rgyud 'grel): stobs ldan bzhugs pa'am// rab tu dga' zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su gnas khang byi dor bya// rten dang mchod pa dngos sam yid kyi rnam 'phrul gyis bkod de/ bu chung gi ro 'jam zhing gnyen pa
111b8(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim po'i chus bkrus la// me tog gi phreng ba btags la/ rang nyid bde bar gnas pa 'am/ da med na yang stan 'bol ba la gnas te/ bdag gis ral gcig ma bsgrubs la/ rang gzhan 
112a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par gzhom par bya'o snyam du bsam mo// de nas skad cig gis rnam pa kun du rtog pa'i tshogs rang sar dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag/ de'i
112a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes la spyi bo mgrin pa/ snying ga gsum du/ oM dkar po dang / AHdmar po dang / hUM sngon po dang gsum shin tu gsal ba ra blta zhing / 'od zer gyi tshogs spros pas 'gro ba'i mi shes pa'i mun pa
112a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bcom nas gnas gsum gyi yi ge la bsdus la// sku gsung thugs rnam par dag cing 'phro 'gyur med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o// dngos po'am mtshan ma thams cad rang gi ngo bos 
112a4(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i don de nyid blta bar bya ba'i phyir/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod cing / dngos po dang mtshan ma'i bag la nyal phra mo tsam yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya'o// 
112a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i ngang las aHdang TaM rim gyis gyur pa las/ pad+ma dmar po dang thod pa khrag gis bkang ba/ de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM sngo zhing dngas pa blta bar bya'o// hUM yongs su gyur pa las gri
112a6(rgyud 'grel): gug gi yu ba nas nyi ma'i steng na hUM gnas pa'o// de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig ma sku sbom zhing thung ba/ mdog bai DUr+ya ltar sngo zhing dngas pa/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma// 
112a7(rgyud 'grel): dang po gnyis ral gri dang ut+pal bsnams pa/ 'og ma gnyis gri gug dang thod khrags thugs kar 'dzin pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bas dbugs bral gyi snying dang rkang pa mnan pa/ 
112a8(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lnga dang / brgya phyed dang / stag lpags dang / klu brgyad sbrul sngon po'i gzugs kyis dbu rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / mgul rgyan dang / dpung rgyan dang / phyag gdub zhabs gdub dang / ska rags/ 
112b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / se ral kha rnams kyis rab tu dpa' ba'i chas su zhugs pa/ spyi gtsug na thub pa mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa spyan gsum me ma dag ltar dmar zhing 'khrug pa chung zad g.yon du gzigs pa/ mche ba gtsig 
112b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ lce glog ltar 'khrug pa/ gad rgyangs chen po sgrogs pa/ phyi nang gi bdud thams cad brlag par byed par bsgom mo// de'i thugs kar pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
112b3(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i hUM sngon po blta zhing / mdun gyi 'dab ma nas g.yas bskor du/ hri tri hUM phaT rnams bsgom zhing / yig 'bru de dag las dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs 'bros pas 'gro ba'i mi shes
112b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mun pa thams cad bsreg par bsam zhing / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan blo gros kyi snang ba thams cad tshur 'dus te rang la bstim zhing bdag nyid yon tan dang tho gros kyi snang ba thams 
112b5(rgyud 'grel): cad phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par bsam mo// de nas bzlas pa bya ste/ g.yas dang po'i ral gri mi rus kyi phreng bar bskur la/ thugs pad+ma nyi mar rigs sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin las ma g.yos pa'i rang
112b6(rgyud 'grel): las/ hri tri hUM phaT ces ci nus su bzlas so// de las skyon pad 'dab kyi yi ge hUM la bsdu/ bdag gzhan gyi blo gros ngan pa'i mun pa thams cad gtan nas dag par gyur cig skam pa'i smon lam 
112b7(rgyud 'grel): drag po gdab po// rjes shes kyi skabs su yang rtag tu dpa' mo'i nga rgyal dang ma bral bar bya'o// de 'dra'i ting nge 'dzin bzlas par bsam// brtan zhing tshad du skyol gyur na// mi shes sprin tshegs 
112b8(rgyud 'grel): dpag med mas// dbyar zad bzhin du dengs par 'gyur// sgrol ma'i blo 'phel slob dpon klu sgrub kyi man ngag mkhan rtag pa rdo rjes tshig le'ur byas pa/ rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po

113a3(rgyud 'grel): rab rgyas spyan gnyis yang dag dmar// g.yas pas mi rus phreng 'dzin g.yon pas kha ma bye ba'i ut+pal sngon po bsnams// ral pa kham pa dang ni ldan pa'i lha mos rtag tu khyed la skyong byung

113a8(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA'i bung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten khams mtha' yas pa snang bar byas nas/ de nas 'og min na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la sogs pa dang

113b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag dang chos thams cad gdod ma na sa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ste/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud d+ho haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata

114a6(rgyud 'grel): pa las dub na sngags don dang ldan pa gzhal du med pa myur ba dang / bul ba dang / mi gsal ba dang / ma tshang ba spangs nas yid kyis dmigs te bzlas par bya'o// de la sngags btu ba ni sde tshan

114b8(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// A snying kar oM yig las pad+ma dmar po lta bu las/ de'i dbus su slar yang bsam par bya ba a yig las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ de'i steng du slar yang bas

115a2(rgyud 'grel): rlar yang nam mkha' la sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya zhing / de yongs su gyur par bcom ldan 'das ma bsam par bya ste/ zhal bzhi pa thung zhing lto ba 'phyang ba chen por 'jigs pa'i klu brgyad kyis brgyan

116a7(rgyud 'grel): swAH/ 'dis phreng ba sbyin no// oM dza Ti dza TI mahAraShA pi na k+Shi ka pU la narba/ shar ya tsi ta bai sho d+hA ya swAhA/ 'dis kyi zug dang bde ba dang gcu dang mda' byin paraHste/ sems rnam par sbyang ba'o//

116b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// @#// matsag mi tshul ma rab pa gcin pa'i phan gzhi bsgrubs babs bzugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ arma tA ra/ oM ka dzA TI u pa de sha sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ mchog gi sgrol ma ral pa gcig 
116b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i man ngag gi bsgrub thabs/ bla ma dam pa rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig rmongs pa'i blo ljongs dang // tshe thung nad dbul dgra bgegs sogs// 'jigs kun sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i mchog/ 
116b6(rgyud 'grel): de yi bsgom rim 'dar gsal bya// dang po kho nar bsnyen pa tshad du son cing // sgrub thabs la blo 'dris pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dur khrod dam byi nang gi rten stobs dang ldan pa la sogs pa bzhugs pa/ yid
116b7(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun zhing shis pa'i gnas khang byi dor byas la/ rten gsum dang / mchod pa lnga ci rigs pa dngos sam yid kyis bshams la/ nal bu'i ro 'jam dri bzangs kyis byugs pa'am/ yang gdan gzhan
116b8(rgyud 'grel): der bsgoms pa'i steng du/ sems gnas pa'i yan lag du/ lus skyil dkrung gis 'dug la/ legs lam gyi gzhi ma nas brtsams te/ chos thams cad kyi mchog gi blo sngon du btang nas/ rang /

122a2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma yA che ge mo mA ra ya sod// bdud po srog la yaM he dza dza/ bdud po brog na d+ha ru na/ hi ma hA kA la sa ma ya dza dza/ zhag bdun bar du gsad pa brtsam// de nas de ni chu la dor// de yis bzas pa brlag par nges// 
122a3(rgyud 'grel): dus mtshams srang mda'i las// gu ru lU sho ris mdzad pa'o// @#// thugs rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba bzhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ kA ru Na tA ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ thugs rje sgrol 
122a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ thugs rje nye 'gyur khro mo lha mor ston// mtho ris thar pa'i bgegs rnams sgrol mdzad ma// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad skyob cing // 'dod yon lnga'i gdung ba sel zin las bzhi yis 
122a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro don mdzad// rtag tu sems can mdun du zhugs// gsol ba btab pas mi bslu ba'i// sgrol ma ral gcig ma la 'dug/ bla ma brgyud pa'i bka' drin gyis// snyan rgyud zhal nas lung bstan pa'i//

127a2(rgyud 'grel): lung sgrub thabs ji lta ba bzhin du byas la/ lam du blangs nas sangs rgyas sgrol ma thob par 'dod pa la don gsum ste/ bskyed pa'i rim pa thun mong ba yin pa'i tshogs lam dang // rdzogs pa'i rim pa thun mong ma 
127a3(rgyud 'grel): yin pa ye shes kyi lam dang / gzhan ma dad pa bzlog pa las tshogs yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dang gsum mo// sgrub thabs bzhin bskyed rim rdzogs nas rang gi thugs ka'i nyi zla'i steng du taM ljang sngon mtha' mar
127a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo 'bru lnga'i 'od zer kha dog lnga'i 'od kyis 'ja' tshon ltar bsams nas/ sngags bzlas te/ dmigs pa de la bltas pas 'od 'phros te/ 'gro ba lnga'i rgyud sbyangs pa dang / rang gi dug lnga sbyangs bsregs 
127a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ 'gro ba drug gi sa bon ye shes lnga'i 'od kyis bsregs pas/ sems can gyi don tha mi dad pa'o// slar 'dus pa las/ rang gi phung po lnga rdo rje sgrol ma dang / 'khor lo sgrol ma dang / rin chen sgrol ma dang / pad+ma/ 
127a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma dang / las kyi sgrol mar gyur pa dang / sAng la rang bzhin med pa dang / gsal la 'dzin pa med pa bsgom/ thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bya'o// de'i grogs gtor ma dang / mchod pa dang / bskor pa 
127a7(rgyud 'grel): dang / maN+Dal dang / bstod pa dang / gzungs dang tsha tsha gdab pa la sogs pas bskangs te/ bskyed rim lam du bslang ba'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa la don bzhi ste/ sna tshogs la ma khyer dang / 
127a8(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma lam khyer dang / nam mkha' lam khyer ro// sna tshogs ni rgya che ste/ skar ma ltar snang ba sna tshogs 'di// gzung ba'i yul chags sdang gnyis la rten nas/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong bar byed
127b1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ de zil gyis mnan pa ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya'o// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos kyang rmi lam lta bur shes par bya// de las ches lhag pa'i chos cig yod na'ang / sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bur shes 
127b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// dngos por rang rgyung ba'i zhen pa log ste/ rgya mar shes pas gzung bas stong zhing 'dzin pas dben pa thabs lha'i rnal 'byor dang / shes rab stong pa de rgya stong pa dbyer med pa la ma yin par rgyal ba'i bka' 
127b3(rgyud 'grel): las gsungs su// de bas na lha'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang / ngag sngags 'brug sgra lta bu dang / sems ting nge 'dzin gsal ba nam mkha'i ngo bor 'das pa ni/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i lam dang po'o// lam gnyis pa nyi ma 
127b4(rgyud 'grel): ni// lus kyi sgrol ma bsgom ste/ 'byung ba rim par brtsegs la sgo gnyis bcad la/ bdag po nang du bsdad la/ khang pa dbus mar me sgron btang la gdugs kyi 'od phab la/ lam po che nas 'thon te/ yul bzhi ru 
127b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas la/ phyi rol thams cad la mi sprad par byas la/ mar me rlung gis bskyod par byas la// rang gi dgos pa nor bu rin po che de la rkun mos mi khyer ba'i mel tshe la brtson par byas la// dbul 'phongs par mi 
127b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// gsum pa thabs khyad par can gyi lam gyis/ sangs rgyas myur du thob par bya ba ni/ mi'i bu mo shes rab sgrol ma bsten la bya ste/ dbang po 'bring po rtog pa zil gyis mnan pa ni/ tshad dang 
127b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i bu mo dang / dam tshig tu ldan pa gsang spyod kyi rten dang / 'ba' yul las su rung ba'i pho nyas/ steng 'og las thams cad bya ste/ kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems skye chu bzhin phab nas/ don dam 
127b8(rgyud 'grel): dang gnyis su med pa'i sems rdzing bzhin du bskyil la/ phyi nang gzung 'dzin sna tshogs thams cad skad cig ma ye shes kyi 'od du bsdus nas/ bde ba chen por bsgom/ sgo lnga yul thams cad bzhi
128a1(rgyud 'grel): ru bsdus la de yang gcig gi ngo bor gsal ba thun dang thun mtshams su bcad la bsgom mo// dbang po rab kyi dbang du byas na/ nam mkha' la mkhyer bsgom par bya ste/ rten med lam du 'jug pa ni/ 
128a2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rnam pa gsum ste/ nang gi nam mkha' dang / phyi'i nam mkha' dang / bar snang gi nam mkha' 'o// nang gi nam mkha' la gnyis te/ shes par bya ba la gsum dang / bzhag par bya ba la gsum mo// 
128a3(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya ba gsum ni/ phyi nang bcud kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad rang gi sems su shes par bya ba dang / sems nyid spros pa nye bar zhi ba dang / de bde chen zung 'jug 'od gsal ba'o// bzhag par bya/ 
128a4(rgyud 'grel): ba gsum ni// nang zab mo'i gtan tshigs gsum ste/ bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis thog ma bar gsum dbyibs dang kha dog ngos gzung rten btsal ba la sogs pa dang / zab mo dbang gi dus dang / snang stong
128a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyed med kyi mtshams ni gnyug ma'i sgrol ma ste/ 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i sgrol ma'o// phyi'i nam mkha' la bzhi ste/ dpe don la bsre ba dang / don dpe la bstim pa dang / de gnyis dbyer med du gnas la 
128a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa dang / nyid gsum gcig tu go bar bya'o// bar snang gi nam mkha' la drug ste/ bems po'i sna rtse dang / 'od kyis sna rtse dang / dran pa'i sna rtse dang / dus kyi sna rtse dang / dbyibs kyi sna rtse dang / myong 
128a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sna rtse dang / thun du bcad la bsgom pa'o// de dag la 'bad pas bskyed pa'i rim pa brtan zhing zhal mthong ba dang / snang rtags thams cad sgyu mar myong ba dang / ngo bo ma skyes pa'i chos la mi skye ba'i
128a8(rgyud 'grel): chos la bzod pa thob nas/ mthong ba dag nas sa dang lam la 'jug ste/ mthar phyin par 'gyur ro// da ni gsum pa las kyi tshogs kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas/ 'gro ba 
128b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dad pa dad par bya ba dang / dad pa phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / skye bo ngan pa bstan pa la sdang ba tshar bcad par bya ba'i phyir/ phan gdags dang tshar bcad par bya ste/ rgyal ba'i bka' dang bla ma'i gdams ngag gi 
128b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes su 'brang ste/ sbed dang mi mtshungs pa rnams la bstan pa na rang ngan song du 'gro ste/ sngon gyi paN+Di ta rnams song ba'i gtam rgyud las shes par bya'o// mtshams med pa byed pa'i skye bo bla ma dang chos
128b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bar chad byed pa de/ kha sbyor dbye bar 'dod na/ bdag rje btsun ma'i bskyed rims brtan pa dang / thugs ka'i 'khor lo 'bum tsho drug 'thon pas des shes rab ngos ni dus kyi gnad dang sbyar ba ste/ 
128b4(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma 'byung ba lnga'i lha mi des yang me lha gtam gyi ngo bor rgyu ba na/ khro mo chen mo dbyings kyi 'od kyis gri gug gis skyeng nas dral// sngags la che ge mo a mu kaM mA ra/ zhes pa ni gnyis zhes bya'o// 
128b5(rgyud 'grel): bkug steg pA lar bcug ste/ ral gris gtubs la/ kho'i srog rlung gi don snying lnga srog pa rtsa nas drangs nas/ khro mo'i zhal du gsol te/ sha zos khrag rngubs rus pa 'chos/ shes pa rlung la 
128b6(rgyud 'grel): sa/ 'aM byags rnam pa' steng bar rgyal gyis gtangs/ ba na/ 'apa sted dAn/ rgyad dang / ngas su na/ bag pa b+hasmras sapas la sgyur byud pa 
128b7(rgyud 'grel): ro// da ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ste bza' ba dang btung ba dang / dri zhim pa dang gos dang / yul dang mi yid du 'ong ba dang / dgra dang thams cad dbang du rang ji lta bar bsgrub pa ni/ yid bzhin
128b8(rgyud 'grel): nor rnyed pa lta bu ste/ rnal 'byor pa chos kyi bar chad 'tsho bas mi 'byung ba ni// sngar bstan pa lta bu/ thugs ka nas nyi zla'i steng na 'od zer lnga'i 'khor lo gnas pa las/ 'od zer lnga 'phros te rang 
129a1(rgyud 'grel): gar 'dod pa'i rang gi ka pA la dum bu gcig pa mdzes shing rgya che ba'i nang du 'ongs par bsams te/ thams cad rang gis sid+d+hi hUM zhes 'ongs par bsams pa tsam gyis// rgyal po'i bsod 
129a2(rgyud 'grel): nams tsam yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bas na yid du 'ong ba thams cad la zhes pa'o// de gang gis 'grub na lha gsal ba dang / ngag brtan pas ste bzlas pas 'grub pa dang / dus kyi gnad la ngal so nus 
129a3(rgyud 'grel): pa des so// da ni rnal 'byor pa 'jigs pa chen po brkyang dang / mi rgod ma rungs pa bcing zhing bzlog par bya ste/ dben par bag yongs su rgyu ba ni/ bdag gang yang rung ba'i lam du rgyu ba'i dus su/ gom pa 
129a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor khar rje btsun sgrol ma yid la dran par wal gyis bya ba dang / g.yas pa'i rogs po spangs la/ de ma yin pa'i rogs kyis thad kar/ spyi gtsug ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcing la/ yi dam gyi gsol ba gdag/ 
129a5(rgyud 'grel): gos kyi bsham gyi sA la nang gi yi ge pa las pad+ma'i steng du trAM ldang sngon bsams la/ de'i 'od kyis 'jigs pa brgyad gang 'ong du bos pa de gos khyang du hril g+h+ri dril la/ rtsu ba gnyis ka bcad la/ bsgrub bya 
129a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams tshun chad/ phyag mtshan rus phreng gi bcad de// 'gul mi shes par byas nas// lam gyi sa tshums cig btums la sngags bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod do// mdud pa dmar po bcings la 
129a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags a mu kaM pA sha ma nA ya swA hA/ de rnams res 'jog ma yin par dus gcig tu bya ba'i man ngag go/ 'jigs pa thar nas mdud pa ma bkrol na sdig pa che'o// rten 'brel de rnams tshang na the tshom med 
129a8(rgyud 'grel): do// da ni shes rab blo 'phel bsgrub par bya ste/ yang sngar bstan pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ chos kyi shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med par bya ba ni/ tshes gcig nas gzung na/ tsan tra rus pa'i bar 
129b1(rgyud 'grel): du sgrub par bya ste/ zhag lngar chu gtsang la sngags btab te/ tho rangs dus kyi gnad la sbyar ste btung ngo // de nas zhag lngar dkar gsum la btags te dus gsum du bzung ngo // de nas zhag lngar sbrar rtsi gzhan gyis 
129b2(rgyud 'grel): ma bags pa la sngags btab la btung ste/ de'i sngags ni 'di'o// oM pradz+nyA pASh+Ti pUSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes mthar rten gyis bzlas te/ tho rangs 'thungs na 'thub po// nam re la sh+lo kasum stong zin no// gal 
129b3(rgyud 'grel): tem grub na yon tan la sogs pa ste/ sngar bstan pa ltar bsnyen pa grub nas/ rang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'dod pa thams cad bsgrubs nas/ rten lha mo byin brlabs ldan pa la/ g.yon pa'i sa dang // 
129b4(rgyud 'grel): mye'i dus su mchod pa dang / gtor mas mnyes par byas la/ bstod pa dang gsol ba btab ste/ sngags kyi mtha' rten/ de ma ta re e kA dza TA ma ne sid+d+h+ya hUM zhes pas 'grub bo chu shel gyi sbyor ba bzhin 
129b5(rgyud 'grel): ma ba da sa sa // s+yak+Sh+ma ung+ga hA hU~M ye+ek+Sha/ du su 
129b6(rgyud 'grel): bar thig le byas na/ gang la ltas pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro// mig rjes la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ mig la bkug na gang 'phrad pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro// chu khyor gang la sngags lan bdun bzlas 
129b7(rgyud 'grel): te/ 'thungs nam spang par zas rnyed par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyi nang du 'gro na/ rang gi gos kyi mtha' ma nas/ lag pa g.yon pas bzung la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te byin na tshig btsan zhing bden par 'gyur ro// 
129b8(rgyud 'grel): shags 'debs nal na thebs shing mi 'da' bar 'gyur ro// lam du 'gron dus dang sbyar na don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzungs rings rtag tu bzlas na/ bdud dang nag po'i phyogs kyi mi tshugs shing // 
130a1(rgyud 'grel): dgra dang bgegs kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang phan yon dang / phan yon gyis nyams su grang ba'i mnapa// tha ma dam pa rnams las ji ltar shes par bya'o// las chags pa'o// 
130a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyang+yas rgyas na thugs rje cir bsdus pa// rje brnyan slopa mthun pas 'dang sgrub ma// de'i sgrub thabs dka 'phel man gnyams sa zung thabs 'jug chags 'dis// mun pa bsal nas 'gro ba'i ngan 
130a3(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba dag gis sgrub par shog/ rdzabad+hAnam skam ma'i ma nangag me la dngas byanas bya ba rdzogs pa// / bems po'i sna tsho dang 'od kyi dang / dran pa'i dang / dus kyi dang / dbyibs kyi dang / 
130a4(rgyud 'grel): brnanas brnya pa'i ngasu na gamam kyi na pag pa'o// ba gnas kyi labs/ sa bas// ba 'dung g+sa g+sas m+b+ha/ rnas pa

130a7(rgyud 'grel): shAng da chung dbang bgad+hAm rgyag dang ga nga shAn/ sa byer chug // dpa ga da nas / das ni gang na nga pa gsas pA \u0f88\u0f90 thA/ ban+d+ha ba sh+thas ba 
130a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa dngas/ gang nags mdag se mas rtsams shing // zhing byed dka ba tha za ma chen dang / gas phyong sa rkye nga can na gas // dza rdzam pal ya 
130b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gyis 'dzin// mtha' yas sngon po'i klu ni 'dud byed cing // thod pa brtsegs ma'i skyil bus kun bkang zhing // de na rnal 'byor pa'i rgyal po Ar+ya de ba la sogs pa shin tu 
130b2(rgyud 'grel): mang ba bzhugs so// rnal 'byor ma ni mdzes ma dang snying stobs can ma la sogs pa'o// de dag ni rgyud gsang 'dzus kyi rjes su 'jug cing gru sgrub yid la byed pa'o// lho'i dur khrod gshin rje 'bar ba'i/ 
130b3(rgyud 'grel): nags tshal/ dpag tshad drug bcu gnyis khor yug pa// dpag tshad bco lnga rgyang grags gcig/ dbyibs ni 'khor lo 'dra/ Dom+bi he ru yis byin gyis brlabs/ bai DUr+ya mdog lo ma brgyar gyes 
130b4(rgyud 'grel): da // ni spyad nag pa ma tha~M ma ha~M ga dong / phyogs skyong gshin rjem he'i gdan dag bcus rin rten mkha' 'gro kyang ka dbang bskur byed // tshe 'phrul ston pa'i mchod rten kyis sa 'dzin// rlung ste dag 
130b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ku ni 'dud byeng cing // thod pa rus pa dum b+hU'i spyil bus bkang // rnal 'byor pa ni a ba d+hAHdang // bag po la sogs pa'o// de dag ni gsang 'dres dang / gshin rjeg shed nag po'i rjes su 
130b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug ci D+hom+bi he ru ka yid la byed do// nub kyi dur khrod chu bdag zod pa can dpag tshad bzhi bcu brgyad khor yug la// dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng ngu gnas// dbyibs ni ban+d+ha lang spyod 
130b7(rgyud 'grel): buzlum po ste/ mkhas pa rta dbyangs kyis ni byin gyis brlabs// b+hi ru'i mdog can lo 'dab rgyas// zhing spyod dmar po gri zed chu srin gdong // phyogs stong chu lha chu srin gdan rig btsas// 
130b8(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma mkha' 'gro chos ston kun d+ha ra/ lha las babs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin// dmar po dga' bo'i klu rnams 'dud byed cing // ro rnams brtsegs pa'i skyil bus kun bkang zhing / 
131a1(rgyud 'grel): de ni rnal 'byor pa ni ku ku ri ba dang / rnal 'byor ma ni snying po'i rgyun ma dang / de dag thams cad ni rgyud sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rjes su 'jug cing / slob dpon rta dbyangs yid la byed pa'o// 
131a2(rgyud 'grel): byang gi dur khrod lus ngan 'jigs byed dang // dpag tshad brgyad cu pa khor yug la/ dpag tshad nyi shu zheng du gnas/ dbyibs ni shing rta rkang pa bzhi pa lta bu/ slob dpon pad+ma can gyis byin gyis brlabs/ 
131a3(rgyud 'grel): mar gang ldang mdog lo ma brgyar gyes shing // zhing skyong ljang gu gri thod khyu mchog gdong // phyogs skyong gnod sbyin khyu mchog gdan rig bcas// las kyi mkha' 'gro las 'byor dam tshig la// bkra shis 
131a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin// ljang gu karko Ta'i klu rab 'dud// ro yi sbrel bus kun nas bkang ba'i zhing // de na rnal 'byor pa ni bzang po dang / rnal 'byor ma ni brdung ma la sogs pa'o// de dag 
131a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud dgyes pa rdo rje'i rjes su 'jug cing slob dpon mtsho skyes rjes su dran par byed do// shar lho'i dur khrod me mtshams dpal 'dren dpag tshad bcu gnyis khor yug la// dpag tshad gsum ni zheng du gan// 
131a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs ni skyes pa gzho nu'i lag mthil lta bu ste/ gtso bo sa ra ha yis byin gyis brlabs// shi da ni a mri'i mdog can lo 'dab rgyas// zhing skyong ser po gri thod ra skyes gdong // phyogs skyong me lhar skyes
131a7(rgyud 'grel): gdan rig bcas// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ro langs sbyin sreg byed// pad+ma spungs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin// dkar po pad+ma chen po'i klu rab 'dud// yi dgas ro yi spyil bus kun bkang zhing // de 
131a8(rgyud 'grel): darnal 'byor pa ni g+han ka na ka dang / rnal 'byor ma ni pad+ma rdo rje la sogs pa'o// de dag ni rgyu bde mchog 'khor lo'i rjes su 'jug cing dpal sa ra ha pa rjes su dran par byed pa'o// lho nub kyi dur khrod dbang ldan 
131b1(rgyud 'grel): ha ha sgrogs zhes pa dpag tshad drug khor yug la/ dpag tshad bzhi ni zhing du gnas// dbyibs ni pad+ma dkar po kha bye ba lta bu ste// dpal mchog nag po zhabs kyi byin gyis brlabs// in+d+ra nI la'i shing ni lo 'dab
131b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas// zhing skyong nag po gri thod mi yi gdong // phyogs skyong srin po yi dgas gdan rig bcas// dam tshig mkha' 'gro gyad rnams nye bar ston// bdud 'dul chen po'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin// gzi can 
131b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar dmar mdog can klu rab 'dud// keng rus yi dgas lo ma'i skyil bus gang // de na rnal 'byor pa ni bram ze stobs can gyi bu rnal 'byor pa gser mdog can dang / rnal 'byor ma ni bzhin khro ma la 
131b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'o// de dag ni rgyud snying po gnyis dang / rta mchog gi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug cing dpal nag po zhabs rjes su dran par byed do// nub byang dur khrod bden bral mun chen zhes pa dpag tshad bcu bzhi pa 
131b5(rgyud 'grel): khor yug la/ dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du gnas// dbyibs ni chu yi ri mo 'khyil pa lta bu ste// mkhas pa ku ku ri pas byin gyis brlabs// shel gyi mdog can shing ni lo 'dab rgyas// zhing skyong
131b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon po gri thod sha ba'i mdog/ phyogs skyong rlung lha sha ba'i gdan rig bcas// thams cad mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i chos ston cing // gtsug phud dag pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin// pad+ma dkar po'i klu 
131b7(rgyud 'grel): ni rab tu 'dud// rtsa spyil rus pa'i rgyan sbas kyis gang zhing // de na rnal 'byor pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / rnal 'byor ma ni zhing la sogs pa'o// de dag ni rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i rjes su 'jug cing dpal ku ku ri 
131b8(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dran par byed do// byang shar gyi dur khrod rlung ngu ca co sgrog ces pa dpag tshad nyi shu khor yug la// dpag tshad lnga ni zheng du gnas// dbyibs ni dge slong gi lhung bzed lta bu ste/ mkha' 'gro rdo rje 
132a1(rgyud 'grel): phag mos byin gyis brlabs// rin chen dung bzlog shing ni lo 'dab rgyas// zhing skyong dkar sham gri thod rta yi gdong // phyogs skyong 'byung po lha yi gdan rig bcas// 'jig rten mkha' 'gro bskyod 
132a2(rgyud 'grel): cing gtor ma 'dzin// chos kyi 'khor lo'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin// nor 'dzin na ros mdog can klu rab 'dud// so phag brtsegs pa'i skyil bus kun bkang zhing // de na rnal 'byor pa ni dpal he ru ka pa dang 
132a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma dang / bdud rtsi ma la sogs pa'o// de ni rgyud kha sa ma ya nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rjes su 'jug cing // rdo rje phag mo rjes su dran par byed do// dpal dbu rgyan gyis 
132a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bi ra ba pas mdzad pa las btus pa/ rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// // dpal rdo rje
132a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khrul pa mya ngam zang chen la// nyon mongs nyi mas rab gdungs pa'i// 'gro ba 'tsho ba'i rlung gyur pa// srog 'dzin mgon la nyer btud nas// gang gis nyon mongs zhi byed pa// 
132a6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs dka' thabs mang rgya mtsho las// mchog gyur mgon pos gsungs pa'i don// bla ma'i gsung las blangs pa brjod// 'di na gang dag nyon mongs can nyon mongs spong ba nyon mongs 'gyur// ji ltar bkres pas kha
132a7(rgyud 'grel): zas dang / skom pa chu la rgyab phyogs bzhin// dper na mi yi bud shing dang // ma phrad sdud cing mi gsal zhing // 'chi 'gyur de ltar 'gro ba'i sems// 'dod pa spangs na ma rung 'gyur// yul la shin tu 
132a8(rgyud 'grel): chags pa'i sems// 'dod pa spangs pas klog byed pa// de ltar mi 'gyur thabs dman phyir// nyon mongs 'phel ba kho nar zad// gang dag shin tu bcings pa'i mi// 'dug nang gzhan du 'gro ba yi// 
132b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa rtag tu bsten byed cing // lus sems bde bar mi 'gyur bzhin// sems mi bde ba don gnyer bas// de rnyed par ni ma gyur par// kun tu rtog pa rgyas 'gyur zhing // gnyug ma'i yid gnas mi 'gyur ba// dper// 
132b2(rgyud 'grel): na glang chen ma rungs pa// gang tshe chang gis rab myos pa// dad kyis dul 'gyur de yi tshe// mkhas pa rnams kyi longs spyod 'gyur// de ltar sems kyi glang po yang // yul gyi chang gi rab myos na// dmu rgod rtog pa
132b3(rgyud 'grel): dul 'gyur zhing // gnyug ma rnal 'byor pa yis len// gang dag spros pas ma spros pa'i// gnyug ma'i sems yid ma rnyed na// rtog pa'i dra bas 'chad min te// rtog las 'khor ba sna tshogs 'byung // de phyir 
132b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag gnyug ma'i yid// mthong bar 'dod pas lus dang sems// kun rtog rlung rnams zhi bya'i phyir// nam yang gdung bar mi bya'o// de ltar gdung ba spangs pa las// sems ni bde ba'i ngo bor 'gyur// 'khrul
132b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sprin sdug 'gag 'gyur zhing // 'od gsal dri med nam mkha' mthong // bde de 'dod pa kun las 'byung // yang dag bla ma'i man ngag bzhin// thabs dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon 
132b6(rgyud 'grel): tan bsten// gti mug 'khrul pa las kyi sprul// sdug bsngal ba klong cher 'khrugs pa'i// 'khor ba'i chu bor byed pa yi// 'gro la brtse ba chen po bskyed// 'dir ni 'di don 'dis mi nus// yang dag ye shes snang ldan/

132b8(rgyud 'grel): bya// btus pa'i sbyor bas lha gang gi/ gnas la dad pas de nyid bsam// byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur ba// gzhug dang mchod sogs thams cad bya// de nas bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma// lang tshe

133a2(rgyud 'grel): zlar ba yis// mdzes pa mdzes par bya ba dang // rnal 'byor la ni rtagazas shing // lhag par zab mo'i chos la dang // khro med nam tog spangs pa'i bdag/ yongs su smin byas byin gyis brlab// ci nyid ga

133a5(rgyud 'grel): nga ros dgang ba dang // gshub pa 'am yang na gsal po ru// chags pa'i tshig gis sbyor ba yis// kha sbyor bde ba dang po bsgom// sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab ldan pa'i// rlung gi rang bzhin pad+ma las/

133a7(rgyud 'grel): mig ni sna rtser phab nas su// gzugs sogs yul la ma zhen par// de dag las skyes bde ba mchog/ yang dag ye shes gnyis pa bsgom// brgyad gnyis 'dab mar bcas pa yi// chu yi ngo bo pad+mal/ 
133a8(rgyud 'grel): snying gar 'bab pa'i ye shes ni// so sor kun tu rtog pa brjod// sgyu rtsal mkhas pas bskyod bya zhing // bu mos kyang ni rked pa bskor// dbugs kyang cung zad cung zad bsdams// dal gyis sgyu rtsal thams cad

143a5(rgyud 'grel): cing 'ung zur sgra grag pa// nyin zhag lnga 'am bcu 'am ni// bco lnga nyin zhag nyi shu 'am// nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid kyi ni// bar du thos par ma gyur na// 'da' dang rgya mtsho yon tan mig/ zla los go rims bzhin du

143a7(rgyud 'grel): mthong bar ma gyur te// lo gsum nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur// rang mig dag gi phyogs bzhir ni// sor mos mnan na gyi la yi// mig dang 'dra ba'i snang ba ni// yud kyi rim pas mthong bar 'gyur// ma bcing bar
